title: Lead Software Developer - Identity
description:
**Techster Solutions** befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst **8+** års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.

  

Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.

 **Rollbeskrivning**:


The Software Developer lead role includes extensive cooperation and collaboration with other Platform teams. We expect that the person taking the lead Developer role will not only express, but also drive the collaborative development within Platform Unified Control Plane with identity management and Security on top of mind at all times. We expect that the interests of Platform Security and Digital Trust cluster will be on top of the lead developer’s agenda, and that the person does not hesitate to express their priority in all development and collaborative efforts within Platform.  

  

As a developer in Digital Trust, you will work in a flexible team of developers, designing, implementing, and maintaining infrastructure using best practices with our solutions and code. You will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and contribute to the automation and scalability of our infrastructure.  

  

There is a strong need to be user oriented, and have the end goal of user success, including the creation of relevant user facing documentation in Backstage using markup annotation.  

  

**Key Responsibilities**:  

Design, develop, and maintain infrastructure as code solutions using tools such as Terraform, Go and Kubernetes API to manage (primarily) Azure Cloud resources.  

Collaborate with software development teams to integrate infrastructure provisioning into the CI/CD pipeline.  

Automate deployment, scaling, and management of cloud resources.  

Ensure security and compliance standards are met in all infrastructure configurations.  

Monitor and troubleshoot infrastructure issues, implement optimizations, and ensure high availability.  

Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices in IaC and cloud computing.  

  

**Qualifications**  

Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, and at least 8+ years of related developer work experience including:  

* Experience managing cloud platforms (mainly Azure)
* Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a multiple team settings, being able to communicate with non-technical stakeholders as well as the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional and co-located teams.
* Senior level programmer with the ability to learn new techniques fast
* Previous experience Programming in Go (Golang)
* Experience working with of containerization technologies, preferably Kubernetes API and Docker
* Strong experience with DevOps principles and setting up/maintaining CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions)
* Excellent problem-solving skills and motivated to share knowledge as well as listening to and taking other team member’s ideas into consideration
* Preferably background working Terraform at scale
* Knowledge and experience in IAM - identity and access management as well security is meriting

  

Main Technologies used in our environment: Go (Golang), Azure, RHEL, SUSE, Ansible, VMware, vRealize, ServiceNow, RedHat Automation platform, Windows, Azure Cloud, DevOps, GitHub, GitHub actions, EntraID, IDM.  

  

Job Description - Nice to have:  

* AWS or Azure certifications are a plus but not required.
**Ansökan**  

Tror du att du är **Techster Solutions** nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.


Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Embedded utvecklare till vårt växande team i Göteborg
description:
**Automotive Engineer till Knowit Connectivity i Göteborg**


Är du passionerad om inbyggda system inom fordonsindustrin? Vill du ta dina kodningskunskaper till nästa nivå? Då är Knowit Connectivity rätt plats för dig! Vi är en dynamisk och snabbt växande IT-konsultfirma som drivs av innovation och ny teknik. I takt med vår expansion söker vi nu talangfulla och ambitiösa individer som vill bidra till vår framgång.

**Din roll som Automotive Engineer**  

Vi söker lagspelare som är stolta över sina bidrag och trivs med samarbete. Om du är flexibel, nyfiken och öppen för nya idéer passar du perfekt hos oss. Vi värdesätter kommunikationsförmåga, proaktiv problemlösning och en strävan att ständigt lära och dela kunskap med kollegor.


Vi arbetar med kunder inom fordonsindustrin, försvar och telekom i Göteborgsregionen. Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsmiljö som inkluderar en mix av arbete på plats, inhouse och remote, beroende på projektet.

**För att lyckas i denna roll bör du ha erfarenhet av:**

* C++/C-programmering eller modellbaserad utveckling med Matlab/Simulink
* Kommunikationsprotokoll eller nätverk inom fordon (t.ex. CAN, Automotive Ethernet)
* Realtidsystem
* Scripting i Python
* Testning på enhets-, integrations- och/eller systemnivå
* Testning med HIL, MIL och/eller VIL
* Kunskap om ISO26262, ISO 21434 och/eller A-SPICE

**Andra meriterande kompetenser:**

* Kravhantering
* Arbete med Autosar; klassisk eller adaptiv
* Erfarenhet av verifiering och validering
* Agila metoder (Scrum, Kanban, etc.)
* End-to-end utveckling (design, implementering, dokumentation, testning, verifiering, validering)

**Ansökan**  

Känner du att detta är rätt roll för dig? Tveka inte att höra av dig eller skicka in din ansökan!

**Kontakt:**  

David Blaag Nilsson – david.blaag-nilsson@knowit.se


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Vi arbetar med löpande urval, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag.

Vi tror att utvecklaren har:

Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Ansök idag! **marjan@crepido.com**

title: Utvecklare C# och C++
description:
**Är du en erfaren utvecklare med en passion för att ständigt lära dig och utvecklas?**

**Vi erbjuder:**

* **Utveckling och Lärande:** Vi ger dig utrymme och tid att utforska nya tekniker och kontinuerligt utvecklas i din roll.
* **Spännande Projekt:** Arbeta med stora namn inom Defence, Automotive, Telecom och fler. Vi skapar lösningar för allt från hemelektronik till industrimaskiner.
* **Samarbete och Långsiktighet:** Vi jobbar nära våra kunder och bygger relationer som varar. Många av våra kunder har varit med oss i över tio år.

* Flytande i C#/.NET och gärna kunnig i C++.

* Erfarenhet av Azure och verktygen kring Microsofts molntjänst.

title: Senior utvecklare - Inbyggda System
description:
*Hej där! Vill du jobba med en blandning av konsultuppdrag och inhouse-projekt? Vill du bli en del av ett duktigt och lite tokigt team på ett bolag med 25 års erfarenhet? Välkommen till gemenskapen!*

##### **Din framtid hos oss**


I 25 år har vi arbetat med produkt- och systemlösningar som verkligen gör skillnad för omvärlden. Innovationsarbetet pågår såklart fortfarande och nu har vi fler tekniska möjligheter än någonsin! Med hjälp av vår innovationsmodell driver vi multidisciplinära projekt med kompetenser från industridesign till mekanik till mjukvaruutveckling för moderna molnplattformar. Vill du vara med oss och göra skillnad?


Vilka tekniker är du nyfiken på? Kanske kommer du ta fram ny funktionalitet för radiosystem skriven i C++? Kanske är det riktigt hårdvarunära arbetet din grej? Då skulle du kunna jobba med industriapplikationer med sensorhantering, motorstyrningar och produkter som är en del av ett mekatroniskt system. Är helhetsförståelsen för både hårdvara och mjukvara något som lockar dig? Är Linux och Yocto din starka sida? Då har vi kluriga uppdrag för dig att sätta tänderna i. Våra uppdragsgivare utgör en härlig blandning av branscher och produkter så vi vill höra vad som är rätt karriärväg för just dig.


Du blir en del av gemenskapen i Hornstull samtidigt som kollegorna på de 10 andra kontoren inte är längre bort än ett chattmeddelande. Medarbetarna är en mix av personer med olika tekniska intressen, utbildningar, åldrar, skostorlekar och hobbys. Här jobbar en fallskärmshoppare, klättrare, vinentusiaster, ölbryggare, DnD-spelare och många andra innovatörer. Vi är ett glatt gäng heltidsanställda och ett par fyrbenta kollegor på deltid.

##### **Matchar vi varandra?**


Vi letar efter mer än erfarenheterna i ditt CV - vi vill träffa vår nästa kollega. På samma sätt tror vi att du söker mer än nya arbetsuppgifter. Du vill till en plats där du kan vara dig själv och få en intressant karriärutveckling. Tillsammans kommer vi matcha dig mot de möjligheter och tekniska projekt som passar våra gemensamma mål. För att ta första steget i samarbetet så söker vi dig som

* Har mångårig erfarenhet av att jobba med utveckling av inbyggda system.
* Har goda kunskaper i C eller C++ samt Python. Utöver det tror vi att du har andra intressanta skills som är meriterande men inte ett krav, kanske Rust eller Yocto?
* Har goda kommunikationskunskaper i svenska och engelska.

##### **Vår kultur**


Vår företagskultur är bland det viktigaste vi har. Vi är alla med och aktivt bidrar till våra gemensamma framgångar och vi motiveras av att samarbeta och driva vår affär framåt. Vår ambition är inte att bli störst, däremot kommer vi alltid sträva mot att vara bäst på det vi gör. Vi är glada över att arbeta på Avalon Innovation och kan stolt säga – jag är en avalon!

##### **Vad händer nu?**


Vad kul att du har läst såhär långt! Har du frågor om oss eller tjänsten? Tveka inte att höra av dig. På grund av GDPR tar vi inte emot några ansökningar via mail.

title: Software Developer
description:
**Nu söker vi dig som vill stärka vårt team inom mjukvaruutveckling till Combitech i Linköping. På Combitech vill vi att du i din vardag ska få göra skillnad för människor, verksamheter och samhälle. Vi erbjuder spännande utmaningar i det digitaliserade samhällets absoluta framkant.**

**Hos oss får du möjlighet att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar både personlig och professionell utveckling samt trygghet och balans i livet. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

**Din roll som mjukvaruutvecklare**
-----------------------------------


Som konsult på Combitech får du möjligheten att arbeta i dynamiska team som hjälper våra kunder på deras digitaliseringsresa. Du blir en del av ett team som gillar mixen av häftig teknik och att ha kul på jobbet. Kollegorna har olika bakgrund och erfarenhetsnivåer vilket gör att du både kommer kunna diskutera och bolla komplexa problem såväl som att få nya infallsvinklar från kollegorna i teamet.


Vi erbjuder ett brett spektrum av spännande arbetsuppgifter inom mjukvaruutveckling, så som arkitektur, kodning, testning och konfigurering. Gemensamt är att du oavsett får arbeta med uppgifter som syftar till att skapa ett säkrare, smartare och mer hållbart samhälle.

**Vem är du?**
--------------


Vi söker dig med teknisk akademisk bakgrund, från nyexaminerad ingenjör till erfaren inom området. Vi ser gärna att du har kunskap och ett intresse av Telecom. Du inspireras av att jobba i team där ni hjälps åt att nå mål och att utveckla varandra. För oss på Combitech är de personliga egenskaperna viktiga och vi tror att du är en positiv och nyfiken person som bidrar till ett bra arbetsklimat och en god teamkänsla. Du trivs med nya utmaningar, har en prestigelös inställning och tar egna initiativ. Du lockas även av möjligheterna att jobba inom olika teknikområden och branscher.


Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

**Då tjänsten kan innebära arbete som omfattas av försvarssekretess krävs det att du genomför och godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.**

**Urvalet sker löpande med uppehåll under julledigheten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

**Kom och gör skillnad**
------------------------


Vi tror att man gör ett bättre jobb om man kan fokusera på rätt saker, därför gör vi det lätt att kombinera jobbet med vardagen. Vi satsar på våra medarbetare, de utgör kärnan, hjärnan och hjärtat i vår verksamhet. Dessutom står vi på en stadig grund av högteknologi, forskning och anställningstrygghet med försvars- och säkerhetskoncernen Saab som ägare.


För oss handlar det om hållbarhet - vi vill bli branschens mest hållbara företag; och för att vara ett hållbart företag i en hållbar framtid behöver vi investera i våra medarbetare. För oss är din återhämtning, dina utvecklingsmöjligheter och din trygghet lika viktigt som företagets framgång - utan våra medarbetare står vi stilla.


Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kolla in våra karriärsidor!


Kontaktperson/Rekryterande chef: Anna Rydetun +46 73 4184493

title: Senior Fullstack Developer, GCP
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.  

At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative, and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Full stack developer to join our Developer Experience Team in Skåne, Sweden.


**About the role**  

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Full stack developer to join our Digital Engineering team. As a Developer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our development and deployment processes. The ideal candidate possesses a strong background in GCP, React, Node JS, Microservices, multicloud experience, DevOps practices, CI/CD methodologies, and has extensive experience working with Agile Methodology.  

The role is situated in Skåne, preferably in Malmö, Lund, or Helsingborg.


**Key Responsibilities**


* Development and maintenance of applications on React, Node JS, Microservices
* Maintaining DevOps pipeline
* Mulitcloud experience like Google Cloud, Ali Cloud etc.,

**Our ideal candidate**

* The ideal candidate possesses a strong background in Front-end application development, DevOps practices, CI/CD methodologies, and agile way of working.
* Work experience as a full-stack developer within Google Cloud Platform with React JS.
* Expert in Front-end application development using React JS.
* Good implementation knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes & Ali Cloud

Experience in setting up DevOps pipeline.  
* 

  

**What you can expect**

* Become part of a the ´flag ship´ success story – We go through enormous growth!
* Based in the Nordics - we have offices in Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Finland in a European and Global Network.
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone.
* Open, ´can do´ team spirit.
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality.
* To work on various challenging client and projects and distributed team structure.
company_addresses: 500 Frank W. Burr Boulevard Teaneck, NJ 07666
company_description: Cognizant helps companies modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they stay ahead in a fast-changing world.

title: Senior Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**

  

* Bistå med förvaltning nyutveckling av system och komponenter som syftar till att effektivisera
* Delta i workshops med verksamhetsrepresentanter
* Bedriva systemutveckling inom Java
* Delta i det agila arbetssättet
* Leverera enligt planer

Samarbeta med övriga uppdrag som berörs  
* 

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**

  

* Minst 10 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling i Java. Erfarenheten ska ha erhållits under de senaste 12 åren
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av minst 1 uppdrag som har inneburit utveckling på Kubernetes plattform.
* Minst 5 årsdokumenterad erfarenhet av SQL samt att arbeta mot databaser, t.ex. MySQL. Erfarenheten ska ha införskaffats under de senaste 8 åren.
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av SpringBoot
* Minst 1 års erfarenhet av Kotlin
* Minst 2 års erfarenhet apputveckling inom iOS med Swift/SwiftUI. Erfarenheten ska ha erhållits under de senaste 5 åren
* Konsulten ska ha god förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på svenska

  

**Meriterande**  

Erfarenhet av SOAP  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 07-01-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: AI Software Developer
description:
### **Din roll**


Som AI Software Developer hos oss kommer du att arbeta som konsult och få möjlighet att samarbeta med olika kunder i varierande branscher. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i utvecklingen av avancerade AI-applikationer. I rollen arbetar du med de senaste teknologierna inom AI och maskininlärning och tar fram lösningar som är skalbara och anpassade för våra kunders behov. Du bidrar med teknisk vägledning och fattar strategiska beslut kring arkitektur och lösningsdesign. Samtidigt stödjer och inspirerar du teamet till teknisk excellens.


Vi erbjuder en miljö där innovation och samarbete är i fokus, och du får möjlighet att vara del av ett passionerat team som arbetar med projekt i framkant av AI-teknologin. Genom rollen kommer du att få erfarenhet av olika verksamheter och tekniska miljöer, vilket gör att du utvecklas och breddar din kompetens.

### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att:

* Arbeta som Tech Lead eller i en liknande ledande roll inom AI-utveckling.
* Ge teknisk vägledning och fatta strategiska beslut kring arkitektur och lösningsdesign.
* Stödja teammedlemmar och inspirera till teknisk excellens.
* Bygga AI-lösningar som är skalbara, hållbara och anpassade för kundernas behov.


Du har arbetat inom några av följande områden:

* **Programmering:** Python (gärna med bibliotek som TensorFlow, PyTorch eller Scikit-learn).
* **AI-teknik:** Erfarenhet av LLM (Large Language Models), Transformer-arkitekturer och generativa AI-verktyg.
* **MLOps:** Erfarenhet av verktyg för AI-pipelines som Kubeflow, MLflow eller liknande.
* **Containerteknik:** Docker och Kubernetes.
* **API-utveckling:** REST och/eller GraphQL.
* **Molnplattformar:** AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.

### **Meriterande erfarenheter**


Det är extra meriterande om du har:

* Kunskap om databaser som SQL eller NoSQL.
* Byggt och optimerat kontinuerliga integrations- och leveransprocesser.
* Erfarenhet av datavisualiseringsverktyg som Tableau eller Power BI.
* Stark förståelse för matematik, statistik och optimering.
* Intresse för etiska och ansvarfulla AI-principer, inklusive fairness och explainability.

### **Varför Knowit?**


På Knowit Connectivity får du en unik möjlighet att kombinera teknik och innovation med personlig utveckling. Vi är ett team av engagerade och kunniga medarbetare som brinner för att skapa värde för våra kunder och samhället. Hos oss får du arbeta i en miljö där din kompetens tas till vara och där du får chansen att växa och utvecklas.


Vill du veta mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss? Besök vår hemsida eller kontakta oss direkt!

### **Låter detta som en roll för dig?**


Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig och diskutera hur du kan bli en del av vårt team.

title: .NET utvecklare till IT-avdelningen
description:
Drivs du av att arbeta i teknikens framkant och vill vara med och utveckla LKAB:s nya lösningar som är en viktig del inom vår digitala utveckling? Bli en del i vårt drivna utvecklingsteam!


Ort: Luleå, Kiruna, Malmberget
Anställningsform: Tillsvidare
Ansök senast: 2025-01-05  


**Framtidens viktigaste jobb**
------------------------------


Vi vill leda omställningen av vår industri mot en hållbar framtid. Och på samma sätt som vi vill förändra världen, vill vi utveckla alla som är med oss på resan, personligt och professionellt. Vill du vara med och forma framtiden för världens gruv- och mineralindustri?



**Din roll**
------------


Under 2024 har vår IT-avdelning vuxit med flera nya medarbetare och nu söker vi fler som vill vara med och utveckla LKAB:s nya lösningar som är en viktig del inom vår digitala utveckling. Vår arbetsmiljö präglas av engagemang, positivitet och omsorg för varandra där vi hjälps åt för att nå uppsatta mål.



I rollen som .NET utvecklare ges du möjlighet att tillsammans i ett team arbeta med att utveckla innovativa och värdeskapande lösningar för LKAB:s olika verksamheter inom bl. a gruva, förädling, logistik.



Våra team består av 5-8 personer och av olika roller som lösningsarkitekt, utvecklare, UX designer. I teamen jobbar vi enligt det agila arbetssättet.



**Det här har du med dig**
--------------------------


För att trivas i den här rollen är du en lagspelare som delar med dig av dina kunskaper och besitter en god problemlösningsförmåga.



Du tar ansvar för dina uppgifter och att leverera i tid med hög kvalitet är en självklarhet för dig.



Du bör vara kommunikativ och ha förmågan att samarbeta effektivt med andra team.



Vidare ser vi att tjänsten kräver:



* Universitets-/högskoleutbildning med erfarenhet och kompetens från liknande roll
* Flera års erfarenhet av backend-utveckling med .NET
* Erfarenhet av agilt arbetssätt.


Meriterande är:



* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Blazor och frontend-utveckling
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps-principer och verktyg för kontinuerlig integration och kontinuerlig leverans (CI/CD).
* Erfarenhet av att designa, implementera och underhålla pipelines för automatisering av bygg-, test- och deployprocesser.


Vi eftersträvar mångfald i vår organisation. Goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska är ett krav.



Körkort och genomförd gymnasieutbildning är ett krav för alla tjänster inom LKAB.



**Det här får du**
------------------

* Belöningsprogram
* Fri träning på LKAB:s egna gym samt hos våra samarbetspartners på verksamhetsorterna i Norrbotten
* Friskvårdsbidrag och studiestöd samt tillgång till konstförening, fritidsförening, fjällstugor och familjeaktiviteter
* Förstärkt föräldrapenning med upp till 90 procent av din ordinarie lön i upp till sex månader (efter anställning i ett år)
* Hjälp och stöd vid sjukdom eller i frågor om arbetsmiljö, hälsa, friskvård och rehabilitering
* Ersättning för tandvård samt skydds- och terminalglasögon
* Möjlighet att ansöka om stipendier vid studier både för dig och dina barn
* Möjlighet att ansluta sig till vårt pensions- och försäkringsprogram med förmånliga priser

**Övrig information**
---------------------


Placering i Kiruna, Malmberget eller Luleå.



Välkommen in med CV och personligt brev senast 5 januari 2025. Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan.



För mer information om tjänsten, vänligen kontakta David Gustavsson, 070-319 81 80. David kommer att finnas tillgänglig för frågor under hela annonseringsperioden, bortsett från de röda högtidsdagarna.

title: Developer D365 within Commerce
description:
Fujitsu is growing and we are now looking for a developer within Dynamics 365 Commerce. We are looking for someone who wants to work as a developer in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce at Fujitsu. Fujitsu's Dynamics team is investing heavily and is in the midst of an exciting growth journey. One of our focus areas is Retail, where we have made a major investment over the past year with a clearer strategy and customer offering, several new colleagues and, above all, lots of new, exciting customer projects.


You will be part of a wonderful, dynamic team where all our employees are specialists in their fields. It is important that you like to work in projects, together with colleagues and clients towards common goals. We are looking for a developer with several years of experience in development within Dynamics 365 or Dynamics AX and have good knowledge of X++ and .Net.


**If you also have experience in any of the areas below, we see it as an extra merit**

* Commerce components within Dynamics 365 such as Scale Unit and Store Commerce.
* Front-end development (TypeScript, React)
* System Integrations
* Azure
* SQL Server

We are looking for someone who is committed, responsive and have the ability to understand and translate the customer's business processes and needs into smart technical solutions. As a person, you are open, social, professional and have client facing skills .


**Your duties include:**

* Design and develop customer solutions based on Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain as well as Commerce modules such as Scale Unit, POS and E-commerce.
* Improve functionality to suit our customers' needs and requirements
* Resolving technical problems

**Location:** Sweden


**Who is Fujitsu?**  

Fujitsu is a world-leading Japanese company in IT and communications. Our market is based on the local customers while using a global Fujitsu perspective. This gives us the opportunity to offer all our customers a wide range of creative solutions, while being a forerunner in innovation. Fujitsu offers a complete portfolio of services, solutions, and products – we are a global partner in the digital transformation.


**What can we offer?**  

As an employee at Fujitsu, you get the opportunity to encounter new and exciting technology, for example, artificial Intelligence, IoT, Big Data, Hybrid IT and much more. We offer a hybrid work environment with flexible hours, where you get the freedom and responsibility to structure your work by yourself. In addition, you get to be part of an inclusive culture with strong cohesion, while at the same time, you get to see beyond the technology and focus on what we can do for our customers, for society and for the environment.
company_description: Fujitsu is a leading Japanese information & communication technology company, offering a range of technology products, solutions & services.

title: Next Generation: Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About the Opportunity**

  

5G and Cloud Radio Access Network is already a reality, and Ericsson is the leader in bringing it to the market. There has never been a better time for you to make your mark. A large group of skilled developers are working energetically to convert 5G and Cloud RAN plans into reality. We are growing and looking for more talent.  

Our organization PEU RAN Performance PEG3 is part of RAN Software & Compute Platforms Engineering Unit in BA Networks and responsible for driving Baseband software product development end to end by having competence and capability to take on full feature responsibility.  

You will experience a truly collaborative and supportive environment, both in terms of tools and colleagues. And you will have lots of fun.  

PEU RAN Performance is located mainly on different sites in Sweden, Canada, China and US. This position is placed at the Stockholm Kista site.

 **What You Will Do**

  

In this we are recruiting System developers, programmers and e2e functional testers.  

General requirements:  

* Develop (integrate and test) 5G and Cloud RAN baseband architecture, functionality, and features in an end-to-end as well as in a partly simulated environment.
* Perform trouble shooting and customer support.
* Drive continuous improvements of products, environments, and processes.
* Analyze new requirements from new features.
* As a functional tester: Write test code for use in verification and continuous integration. Handle the test environment, both the actual system test plant and the test environment with tools and automation frameworks.
* As a programmer: Deliver inventive, high quality and optimized code. Write unit and multi component tests to secure the quality of your deliveries.
* As a system developer: Perform systems studies in the area of Radio Physical Layer for radio functions like Beam Forming, Massive MIMO for 5G/6G etc.
 **The Skills You Bring**

* Interest in and a drive to learn software test and integration
* MSc in a technical field or the equivalent level of knowledge
* Programming skills preferably in C, C++, Python
* Basic Real time embedded systems knowledge
* Telecom/mobile communication knowledge
* A productive, creative mindset can help you interact easily with other people
* Competence in AI/ML and Cloud technologies is an advantage
* Good Communication skills and fluent in English
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Senior Software Developer C/C++
description:
We are Advantek – an innovative technology company focusing on creating the best engineering solutions for our customers.
  
We are a family – We enable each other and challenge one another. We strongly believe that the key to success is not only working as a team, but also focusing on each individual and meeting their needs to give each of our team players the ability to be the best version of themselves. At Advantek we are confident in our culture, relations, and our capabilities.
  
We are expanding – Our division is growing and we’re looking for Senior Software Developers who have the full skill set in C++. As a SW developer you will work as a consultant on various assignments. We value a positive attitude and that you like to learn new things. You thrive in an environment that engages and challenges you - where you get the opportunity to combine your programming skills with your problem-solving ability. In your role as an engineer for Advantek, you play a vital role in our future and our customers future, in contributing to successful projects and products.

CAN / CanOpen

title: UNIKA Mjukvaruutvecklare inom inbyggda system!
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Är du unik? Då kan du vara klippt och & skuren för rollen som embeddedutvecklare hos oss.



Affärsområdet Engineering på Sigma Connectivity WSI i Stockholm fortsätter att växa med rätt personer. Här arbetar vi huvudsakligen ute hos kund på spännande uppdrag (på-plats-konsulting). Din kompetens utvecklas i mötet med & arbetet på kundbolag, som värnar om kvalitet och konsultmässighet.


### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



Om du har flera års arbetserfarenhet av inbyggda system (typ 4-10 år) i olika roller, känner till flera eller de flesta av språken/ramverken/verktygen som nämns nedan, och har kunskap samt erfarenhet av "HW bring ups", tror vi att du kan vara en av våra framtida kollegor.



**Krav**



* Flera års arbetserfarenhet i Sverige
* Utveckling av drivrutiner
* Firmware- och embeddedutveckling
* Modern C++, & gärna C &/eller Pythonkunskap
* Inbyggd Linux, Yocto
* Realtidsoperativsystem

Vi söker dig med driv att lära dig nytt och med nyfikenhet att utföra uppdrag hos olika kundföretag. Du kan på ett enkelt sätt tydliggöra dina färdigheter och göra dig förstådd när du djupdyker in i techvärlden med tekniskt kunniga personer, men även när du snackar teknik med "technical dummies". Är du dessutom initiativrik och har en passion för att dela med dig av din erfarenhet, samt att kunna jobba i team är du nog ännu mer rätt hos oss!



Framförallt är det meriterande om du har någon av följande hobbies:


* Löpning

* Bilbana
* CNC-fräsning
* Brädspel
* Scrap booking
* Gammal träbåt

### **WE OFFER**


* Komplett försäkringspaket med tjänstepension

* Möjlighet till billeasing
* En inkluderande företagskultur där vi stöttar varandra & gärna delar erfarenheter och kunskap.
* Både juniora & seniora fantastiska kollegor, som älskar att utveckla coola produkter.
* Ett kontor där vi har kul ihop.
* En miljö med kunskap om både hårdvara & mjukvara, samt all utrustning för att bygga & testa produkter internt.
* Teamaktiviteter med WSI-kollegor & resor med hela Sigma Connectivity (vårt moderbolag).
* Labb på kontoret

Våra värdeord sammanfattar oss väl: "Commited, Inventive, Passionate, Always Together"



Hos oss är du aldrig ensam!

Emilie Garcia,
  

Emilie.Garcia@sigmaconnectivity.se

title: Software Process Developer
description:
*Do you want to shape and maintain software development processes where compliance with standards and regulations is seamlessly integrated? Are you passionate about working hands-on with code to enhance tools, automation, and methodologies? Would you like to influence how we work with software development at Zenseact?*  

  

*Apply today – no CV needed at the first stage! Just share your name, email, and phone number. We’ll take care of the rest later.*

**Insights from the Team**


Our team is driven by the mission to create the safest possible software while delivering quality and safety-assured products. Our goal is to make it easier for developers to follow a seamless process, maintaining high-quality standards with robust tools and automation.


We’re forming a Software Process Core Team of four members and are looking for skilled developers to join us. Your focus will be on coding-level tasks and tool development, pioneering efforts to streamline compliance and enhance efficiency in software development.

**Your Mission and Day-to-Day Tasks**


You will be working hands-on with coding to improve our tools, automation, and methodologies. Typical tasks on a day-to-day basis include:

* Maintain and improve the software development process.
* Provide general support (e.g., answering questions in Slack).
* Script and develop tools to support software development.
* Build tools to measure process compliance and effectiveness.
* Maintain and improve existing tools (e.g., FMEA, static architecture tools).
* Create new tools to automate processes and simplify developers' daily work.
* Keep self-audit tools and procedures up to date.
* Deliver training sessions on the software development process.
* Refine the methodology for the "Software Element Definition of Done."
* Monitor and ensure process adherence across Zenseact teams.

**What’s in It for You?**

* Directly influence Zenseact’s software development processes and tools.
* Work on groundbreaking approaches to continuous compliance, a critical challenge in automotive software.
* Be part of a forward-thinking company committed to safety, innovation, and inclusivity.
* Collaborate with talented individuals from diverse backgrounds, fostering creativity and growth.
* Enjoy a flexible work approach and genuine work-life balance.

**Qualifications & Experience**

**Essential experience**

* Several years of experience in software development activities (e.g., requirement breakdown, architectural design, implementation, testing).
* Expertise in safety and quality standards (e.g., ASPICE and ISO 26262).
* Proficiency in Python and familiarity with Bazel.
* Strong skills with Git and Gerrit.
* Pedagogical abilities to train and support others effectively.

**Nice to have, but absolutely not a must have!**

* A passion for developing tools and processes to simplify and improve software development workflows.

**More about Zenseact**

**Our software makes a difference.**


Using AI-based technology to create the ultimate driver support, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Every year, around 1.4 million people die in traffic while approximately 50 million people are injured. Many face lifelong challenges due to their injuries. We can do better.

**One purpose, one product.**


We’re a software company dedicated to revolutionizing car safety. By designing the complete software stack for autonomous driving and advanced driver-assistance systems, we’re pushing the boundaries of safety. Zenseact was founded by Volvo Cars, with teams based in Gothenburg and Lund Sweden, Munich in Germany and Shanghai, China. Our goal is to speed up the transition to safer automation through cutting-edge software and innovation.

**Culture with people at heart**


Achieving our mission to save lives and end traffic accidents requires us to venture into the unknown, pioneering new technology. While our expertise drives us, it’s our united culture that enables success. By fostering psychological safety, inclusion, and belonging, we ensure everyone can thrive.


Zenseact works proactively to create a culture of diversity and inclusion, valuing differences in gender, race, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation, and age. Diversity drives innovation, making it a cornerstone of our success.


Interviews are held continuously, so we highly recommend submitting your application as soon as possible!

title: Senior Business Developer - Strategy & Funding
description:
Do you thrive on making a difference? Are you driven by development and want to be part of the journey to take our business to the next level? Then this might be your next job!

### **Let us tell you a little bit about us**


Modvion builds the next generation of sustainable wind turbine towers with laminated wood – natures carbon fiber. Using wood enables radical reductions in carbon emissions, making it possible to generate net zero energy from wind power. In fact, considering that wood is also storing carbon, the tower itself is carbon negative – storing more carbon than is produced during manufacturing, transport and installation. To reach stronger and more stable winds and produce more energy, wind turbines are getting bigger in every sense. Thanks to our patented module system, we have developed a cost-effective solution enabling transportation for installations of tall towers.


At Modvion you get to work with driven, positive and creative people who inspire each other. What we’re doing can make a real difference for the climate and accelerate the transition to renewable energy. Take the chance to join one of the most interesting companies in cleantech at a pivotal time!


Modvions first commercial wind turbine tower was installed in 2023 and the interest from customers has never been higher. It is an exciting time to join us!

### **What will you be doing**


At Modvion there is a lot of action! As we grow you will be one of the drivers of our strategic business development and funding processes and work broadly with both operational and strategic tasks.


As we are on a journey, we need to move forward in an agile way having short decision-making paths, which means that you have a great opportunity to influence and that no two days are the same.


You will have an important role where we want you to drive your own projects and tasks forward, coach and challenge the rest of us so we can grow together. In this role you will work closely with colleagues across the company, including the management team.

### **We are looking for**


To succeed in this role, we envision you bringing over 10 years of extensive experience across a broad spectra covering key areas of business development, including business intelligence and analysis, M&A and strategic partnership evaluations. life cycle assessment (LCA) and environmental impact evaluations, advanced financial modeling, navigating both private and public funding landscapes and strategic cross-functional project management.


We expect you to hold a relevant advanced degree, with fluency in both Swedish and English, written and spoken, as well as a proven track record of seniority in leadership.


As a senior business developer at Modvion, you possess a strategic, results-driven mindset and demonstrate exceptional initiative in driving growth and transformation. You are known for your ability to lead with authority and influence, fostering deep relationships based on trust and clear, impactful communication. Your ability to challenge the status quo and provide innovative solutions will drive both internal and external stakeholders toward shared goals.


Experience in leading or advising smaller start-up organizations, navigating their growth trajectories, and understanding the unique challenges and opportunities of entrepreneurial environments would be highly valued.

### **We offer you:**

* First of all, we offer a meaningful, challenging, and fun everyday job.
* Flexibility and freedom with your responsibilities, we trust our employees
* Freedom to plan your daily work to fit with your life
* Gym and table tennis at work
* Health and wellness allowance ‘Friskvårdsbidrag’
* Team activities and more!


The position is based at our office and HQ in Gothenburg with the opportunity to work from home when needed.


Does it sound like your next challenge?


If you are ready to take on a new challenge and explore the next generation of wooden wind turbine towers, then you have come to the right place. Come join us!

title: Developer
description:
Grow with us
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 Hardware Engineering strives to be the most competitive Radio Network R&D unit in the industry. We work in an agile set-up to develop and maintain competitive, high-quality Radio products which give our customer solutions securing future growth.
   

  

 Control Software is part of the Hardware Engineering (EU HW) Radio within Business Area Networks (BNEW). We are based in Kista, Stockholm. We also have a close corporation with development of PEU Radio products in Ottawa, Beijing, Nanjing, Chengdu, Lund and Zagreb.
   

  

 Control Software provides possibility to work with the latest technology within telecommunication development. We can offer a rich number of opportunities in an everyday learning, creative and challenging atmosphere where Kista, Stockholm, is our base but the world is our arena.
   

  

 We provide the SW platform for radio products also known as the auxiliary control system (XCS). We organize in cross functional development teams, and we are involved in several activities at the same time. We are in an intense phase, due to 5G development, with many new products in the pipeline. There is a high pressure on quality, flexibility and understanding of HW and SW. It also means working with skilled colleagues in an inspiring environment.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Developer to develop the auxiliary control system (XCS) for radio. Your role will include system design, SW design, trouble shooting in target environment and product documentation. Knowledge about Linux and SW close to HW is of high value.
   

  

 Team has the end-to-end responsibility for developing and maintaining our Production System loops which are used for quality assurance, building, and delivering XCS products.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* You will drive strategic technical leadership
* Develop and test high quality products
* Perform trouble shooting internally and on customer networks as well as handling customer support in general
* Drive continuous improvements of products and processes
* Develop competence in technical domain
* Execute continuous improvements of products and processes, bring up new SW platforms
* You will be given a more specific area of responsibility after becoming productive, and depending of interest


**The skills you bring:**
* Education: MSc in engineering or similar
* Min years of experience: 5 years of relevant experience
* Domain experience: Linux and SW close to HW, systemization and trouble shooting, ASIC knowledge is benificial
* Experience from SW development in a Linux environment using e.g. GIT, Gerrit, Junit, Jenkins, Nexus, Bash/Shell, Artifactory
* Several years of experience working with C/C++ in an embedded environment
* Experience from designing and executing automated test scripts in Java, Python or similar.
* Product development knowledge and Product Lifecycle Management knowledge
* Ability to work with highly competent colleagues
* Being flexible and responding to change
* Delivering results and meeting customer expectations


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 755165

title: Backend Software Engineer (.Net Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
* Create systems that are not only scalable but also resilient, ensuring graceful failure.
* Manage the software lifecycle from design and development to testing and production deployment.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, but primarily with C# and .NET Core.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our development processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional products.


**Requirements**
* Experienced professional in team-based development, deployment, and maintenance of software products in production.
* In-depth knowledge of .NET Core and a deep passion for technology.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and testable code.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or related technical discipline.


**Good to have**
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Experience working with service-oriented architecture and distributed systems.
* Experience with Kubernetes or similar technologies.
* Experience working with AWS.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow developers empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Back End Developer
description:
Join our growing engineering team, a close-knit group of five engineers with diverse technical and cultural backgrounds. We’re located in Stockholm and another hub, working primarily remotely with frequent meetups in one of our offices or sunny off-site locations.
 



 This is a unique opportunity to join a team, where there is ample room to make a significant impact and help shape both the engineering organization and culture.
 


 Our Engineering Principles
 * **Bias to Action** 
 : We thrive in uncertainty by rapidly prototyping and iterating.
* **Open Communication** 
 : We value candid conversations to realign and improve our work.
* **Passion for Challenges** 
 : We embrace complex problems with curiosity and creativity.



 Our collaborative culture encourages knowledge-sharing and a foundation of respect, openness, and curiosity. We celebrate diversity and welcome perspectives that challenge our thinking. And of course, we believe in having fun while building great things together!
 


 Our Tech Stack
 * **Backend (Web App)** 
 : Golang, GraphQL
* **Frontend** 
 : TypeScript, React, GraphQL/Apollo
* **Data Pipelines** 
 : Python, BigQuery
* **Database** 
 : PostgreSQL
* **Cloud** 
 : GCP
* **Version Control** 
 : Git



 We continuously iterate and explore new technologies, so our stack evolves as we grow!
 


 How You’ll Make an Impact
 * Design, prototype, build, and own new product features.
* Develop the backend for our data-intensive web app.
* Integrate with third-party services, including financial systems and APIs.
* Enhance the reliability, observability, and performance of our systems.
* Write comprehensive unit and integration tests.


 What We’re Looking For
 * 5+ years of backend development experience.
* Solid experience with SQL.
* A proactive mindset and eagerness to learn new technologies.
* Ability to strike a balance between speed and quality in development.
* Strong collaboration skills and the ability to clearly articulate ideas.
* High sense of ownership over your work.



**Nice to Haves** 
 :
 


* Experience with Python or Golang.
* Knowledge of cloud deployments and Docker configurations.


 Benefits
 * **Travel Opportunities** 
 : Join your team at quarterly off-sites
* **Coworking Membership** 
 : Remote work is our default, but we provide coworking memberships for those times you want a change of scenery.
* **Stock Options** 
 : Share in the company’s growth and success.
* **Pension** 
 : Plan for your future with a comprehensive retirement plan.
* **Health Insurance** 
 : Access top-tier local health insurance for fast and reliable care.
* **Wellness Stipend** 
 : Enjoy €500 annually for wellness-related expenses—whether it’s gym memberships, massages, or more.
* **Time Off** 
 : Recharge with 30 paid holidays annually.



  





 Let’s build the future of fintech together!

title: Junior Product Developer for Dining and Kitchen products at H&M HOME
description:
**Job Description**
**The role**
 As a Junior Product Developer for the Dining room and Kitchen focusing on hard deco products and materials (such as ceramics, glass, wood, stone, straw) you will join a tight team of Product Developers, Designers and Planners that is led by a Product Manager. As a Junior Product Developer you will actively support your Product Developer with daily tasks and to organize and execute the component- and product development process in an efficient way, in close collaboration with our production teams around the world. With a clear and efficient component and product development you contribute to meaningful growth and profitability in the department.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 To succeed in this position we believe that you love to work as part of the team to develop the best products and best assortment for the customer. You always see possibilities, improvements and simple solutions. You thrive when working in a fast-paced environment and take on a lot of responsibility. Finally, you have a big passion for interior and are constantly up to date with the latest trends and what happens in the global community.
   

  

* Degree within product development, buying, retail business or similar
* Preferably 1-2 years experience from a similar role
* Experience from developing hard deco products & materials (such as ceramics, glass, wood, stone, straw) is considered as a plus.
* Understanding of production processes and the capabilities and limitations
* Knowledge and experience in PLM systems
* Creative, curious and have a big interest for interior
* Independent and a solution-oriented problem solver
* Strong administrative, organizing and prioritizing skills
* Flexible mindset with the ability to see the bigger picture, short and long term goals
* Demonstrated communication, problem solving and collaboration skills
* Result oriented and strong business growth mindset
* Strong salesmanship and commercial thinking


**Additional Information**
**About the recruitment process:**
 This is a full-time
 **temporary position** 
 of one year, placed in Stockholm and start in end of March. Do you find this position interesting and suitable for you? We would like to receive your application as soon as possible;
 **but no later than** 
**5th of January** 
 . Interviews will be held continuously. Please initiate a dialogue with your manager before applying.
   

  

**Benefits:**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity:**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

**Company Description**
 At H&M HOME we are building a world class interior brand. Made to inspire, the collections merge a personal home. With us, you get the opportunity to work close to our customers in a creative and dynamic culture. Here, you can use your drive and ambition to set our business in motion and we challenge you with great responsibility from the start. We take care of each other, and we never compromise on sharing ideas and knowledge. With our entrepreneurial and collaborative mindset, we can inspire and attract customers all over the world. H&M HOME is a global Interior brand within the H&M group – one of the biggest fashion and design companies in the world.
   

  

 We are looking forward to hearing from you!

description:

 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.

* High proficiency in English, particularly in writing.
* Strong communication skills, with experience in handling customer support.
* Experience in app development or relevant development roles.
* Strong understanding of the development process and effective communication with developers.
* Interest in voice and video calling technologies.


**Good to have**
* Familiarity with Android and iOS application development (Kotlin, Swift).
* Experience of using tools such as Datadog and Kibana for monitoring systems and performing root cause analysis through detailed log and metric exploration.

* Experience with voice and video calling.
* Familiarity with WebRTC technology, IP networks or telecom networks.

title: Game Developer Intern
description:
Realdini Studios is an emerging start-up that creates immersive games with cutting-edge AI storytelling and innovative gameplay. Join us as we lay the groundwork for something extraordinary and reshape the future of gaming experiences!
 



  





 Role Description
 



 As a Game Developer Intern, you’ll focus on developing game logic, features, and functionality using Unreal Engine. This role suits candidates with a strong technical foundation, logical thinking, and a passion for developing innovative gameplay mechanics.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 


* Collaborate with the development team to design and implement gameplay features.
* Write and debug game logic and mechanics using Unreal Engine.
* Contribute to innovative solutions to enhance player experience.
* Engage in brainstorming sessions to bring fresh ideas to life.
* Test and optimize game performance for a seamless experience.
* What We’re Looking For
* While technical skills are important, we value:
* Reliability: Dependable individuals who deliver on commitments.
* Personal Fit: Team players with a collaborative spirit and enthusiasm for gaming.
* Growth Potential: Candidates with a genuine passion for learning and contributing to innovative projects.



  




* Required Skills:
* Familiarity with Unreal Engine and its features.
* Strong problem-solving and technical abilities.
* Experience in programming game logic and developing gameplay features.
* What You’ll Gain
* This is more than just an internship; it’s a stepping stone into the gaming industry:
* Hands-on experience with Unreal Engine and advanced AI technologies.
* The opportunity to directly contribute to the creation of immersive games.
* A chance to build your portfolio and enhance your resume with real-world projects.
* Insight into the creative processes at Realdini Studios, a leader in AI-driven game storytelling.



  




* Important Details
* This is an unpaid internship focused on skill enhancement and career development.
* I'm just wondering if you're aware this is an unpaid internship focused on enhancing your skillset and resume.



  




* Join Us in Shaping the Future of Gaming
* 
* If you’re ready to unleash your creativity and take your skills to the next level, we’d love to hear from you!
* ### \*\*AI Developer\*\*



  




* - \*\*Focus\*\*:
* - Integrating AI models for various functionalities, including storytelling, asset generation, and NPC behavior.
* - Experimenting with and implementing state-of-the-art AI technologies to enhance gaming experiences.
* - Ensuring seamless AI integration within Unreal Engine workflows.
* - \*\*Ideal Candidate\*\*:
* The main focus is personal fit, wanting to learn. This is a plus:
* - Strong programming skills with a focus on AI technologies and an interest in cutting-edge innovations.
* - Capable of researching and adapting new AI models into game development pipelines.
* - \*\*Required Tools, Techniques, and Software\*\*:
* - \*\*AI Frameworks and Libraries\*\*: Familiarity with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or OpenAI APIs.
* - \*\*Generative Models\*\*: Experience working with LLMs (like LLAMA, GPT) and generative tools for images, videos, and 3D assets.
* - \*\*Text-to-Speech Systems\*\*: Knowledge of TTS frameworks such as Google Text-to-Speech or Tacotron.
* - \*\*AI-Assisted Tools\*\*: Tools like Runway ML, NVIDIA Omniverse, or Adobe Firefly for asset generation.
* - \*\*Unreal Engine AI Systems\*\*: Understanding of Behavior Trees, Blackboard systems, and integration of AI-driven characters.
* - \*\*Optimization Techniques\*\*: Proficiency in balancing AI complexity with game performance requirements.
* - \*\*Experimentation Skills\*\*: Ability to research and test the latest AI models, such as MidJourney or Stable Diffusion for generated visuals
