title: Principal Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Company Description**  

We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!  

  

We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.  

  

With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences, and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.  

  

We are looking for you who want to grow with us!


With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.

 **Job Description**  

Daily Tasks

* Design and develop and review advanced machine learning models and architectures, including deep learning, optimization, and generative AI systems
* Lead complex AI/ML project initiatives, providing technical guidance and architectural oversight to cross-functional engineering teams
* Conduct in-depth research and experimentation to evaluate emerging AI technologies, assess their potential applications, and develop proof-of-concept solutions
* Review and optimize existing AI systems for performance, scalability, and efficiency, implementing advanced techniques like model compression and transfer learning
* Collaborate with product managers and stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical AI strategies and implementation roadmaps

  

**Qualifications**  

Minimum Technical Skills

* Expert-level proficiency in Python, with deep understanding of machine learning libraries
* Advanced knowledge of machine learning algorithms, neural network architectures, and AI model development
* Extensive experience with cloud platforms (must have GCP, nice to have Azure) and AI/ML cloud services
* Strong background in statistical modeling, data preprocessing, and feature engineering
* Proficiency in big data technologies and distributed computing frameworks
* Demonstrated ability to design and implement scalable machine learning infrastructure


Leadership and Experience Level

* Minimum of 8-10 years of professional experience in AI/ML engineering
* Proven track record of leading complex AI initiatives from conception to production
* Senior technical leadership experience, capable of mentoring junior engineers and driving technical strategy
* Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Demonstrated innovation in AI research or practical applications

  

**Additional Information** **Start:** Immediately  

**Working hours:** 100%  

**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden  

**Form of employment:** Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months of probationary employment

title: Technical Architect with HR-Experience
description:
**Start****ASAP****Duration****4-6 months**
  
emagine is looking for a Technical Architect with HR-Experience for a very interesting transformation assignment.

**Start: 2025-01-07**

**Duration: 6 months, extension possible**

**Location: Stockholm, min 2 day/week onsite**


We are looking for an Technical Architect with HR-Experience to focus on enhancing HR technological frameworks and operational processes while serving as a trusted advisor to key stakeholders. This role requires a holistic perspective, defining, managing, and optimizing the HR IT landscape to create value for the organization.

**What you will do:**

* Ensure the HR architecture enables business value optimization and aligns with both strategic and tactical goals.
* Develop execution plans to achieve the target HR architecture, including value cases and return on investment, and ensure outcomes align with objectives.
* Provide a broad understanding of business interactions that extend beyond technical aspects.
* Act as a bridge between IT vendors and the organization, effectively communicating requirements, assessing external partner input, and serving as a gatekeeper throughout the process.
* Participate actively in forums, working groups, functional areas, and regional teams to maintain architectural alignment.
* Lead as a technical and solution expert on HR IT and business-driven targets, demonstrating a clear methodology for solution design.

**Your profile:**  

You are a strategic thinker and a hands-on problem solver, ready to lead technical and solution design efforts for HR IT and business-driven initiatives. You thrive in navigating challenges, showing resilience and dedication to continuously refine a fit-for-purpose HR technology landscape.

**You have have:**

* Strategic and tactical experience with HR technology and platforms, including planning for HR architecture in complex environments.
* Deep knowledge and experience in HRIS/HCM systems, **preferably Oracle Fusion Cloud HCM.**
* Demonstrated cross-functional understanding of business processes, challenges, and technologies in domains beyond HR, such as Finance and Sales.
* Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to clearly explain how technology supports business objectives to non-technical stakeholders.

title: Account Executive - Data Center / Networking + Compute
description:
Our team is looking for a talented and energised salesperson, highly regarded in your field, with the skills to simplify a message to drive success and scale. A positive self-starter demeanour is vital, as is the ability to work at pace, adapt and evolve, which will be part of your every day; month in, month out. You will form part of a dynamic, hardworking and close-knit team, one that truly believes in the power of working together as one.**Who you'll work with**
------------------------


We are Cisco Sales. We sell products, services and solutions that make our customers successful. Envision participating in major groundbreaking projects, spanning diverse geographies to some of the most recognised brands in the Netherlands and worldwide. You will be part of an outstanding team of passionate and driven sales specialists and will be aligned to a market sector where you will work with Account Teams, Technical Account specialists, the wider Product Sales Specialist Community, Partners, Renewals teams and Technology specialists. The opportunity to succeed will come from working hand in hand on crafting and proposing with the wider teams and combining the technology and people.

**What you'll do**
------------------


You will join the Netherlands Sales Specialist, which consists of highly motivated, tech-savvy sellers. We are at the forefront of the Multi-Cloud World! Together we are redefining the market: come and define it with us! The Data Center Product Sales Specialist plays a crucial role in the success of Cisco's strategy in this market segment. This individual will be responsible for working on Cisco's newest and most innovative entries into the Data Center market segment (i.e. AI Infrastructure, Compute platforms, Software Defined Networking, Network Automation, Cloud Management and related technologies). The candidate must be of a calibre that can contribute to our Account teams internally as well as most importantly to our customers and channel and strategic partners.

**Minimum requirements:**
-------------------------

* 5 - 10 years of demonstrable sales specialist experience in Datacenter / Compute space
* Build and define sales strategy for a given geographic, implement the sales strategy in conjunction with the local sales team, manage forecast and build a healthy pipeline of opportunities
* Define the business plan to gain market share, and build solid relationships with customers and internal constituents.
* Proven experience of successfully selling at C-LEVEL
* Product Sales Specialists will be responsible for gaining market penetration with the associated solutions as well as establishing a breadth of reference accounts in a variety of verticals.

**Preferred requirement:**
--------------------------

* Drive independently a full E2E sales approach on large (>1M$) deals
* Setup events for customers & partner and take ownership for target group, invites, promotion, registrations, etc.
* Lead partner landscape, align our strategic priorities to them and their managed service proposition and how we leverage our collecting proposition to the market.


Why Cisco?


#WeAreCisco. We are all unique, but collectively we bring our talents to work as a team, to develop innovative technology and power a more inclusive, digital future for everyone. How do we do it? Well, for starters – with people like you!


Nearly every internet connection around the world touches Cisco. We’re the Internet’s optimists. Our technology makes sure the data traveling at light speed across connections does so securely, yet it’s not what we make but what we make happen which marks us out. We’re helping those who work in the health service to connect with patients and each other; schools, colleges, and universities to teach in even the most challenging of times. We’re helping businesses of all shapes and sizes to connect with their employees and customers in new ways, providing people with access to the digital skills they need and connecting the most remote parts of the world – whether through 5G, or otherwise.


We know that powering an inclusive future starts with us. Because without diversity and a dedication to equality, there is no moving forward. Our 30 Inclusive Communities, that bring people together around commonalities or passions, are leading the way. Together we’re committed to learning, listening, caring for our communities, whilst supporting the most vulnerable with a collective effort to make this world a better place either with technology, or through our actions.


Be you, with us! #WeAreCisco


  
**Message to applicants applying to work in the U.S. and/or Canada:**  

  

When available, the salary range posted for this position reflects the projected hiring range for new hire, full-time salaries in U.S. and/or Canada locations, not including equity or benefits. For non-sales roles the hiring ranges reflect base salary only; employees are also eligible to receive annual bonuses. Hiring ranges for sales positions include base and incentive compensation target. Individual pay is determined by the candidate's hiring location and additional factors, including but not limited to skillset, experience, and relevant education, certifications, or training. Applicants may not be eligible for the full salary range based on their U.S. or Canada hiring location. The recruiter can share more details about compensation for the role in your location during the hiring process.
U.S. employees have **access** to quality medical, dental and vision insurance, a 401(k) plan with a Cisco matching contribution, short and long-term disability coverage, basic life insurance and numerous wellbeing offerings.


Employees receive up to twelve paid holidays per calendar year, which includes one floating holiday (for non-exempt employees), plus a day off for their birthday. Non-Exempt new hires accrue up to 16 days of vacation time off each year, at a rate of 4.92 hours per pay period. Exempt new hires participate in Cisco’s flexible Vacation Time Off policy, which does not place a defined limit on how much vacation time eligible employees may use, but is subject to availability and some business limitations. All new hires are eligible for Sick Time Off subject to Cisco’s Sick Time Off Policy and will have eighty (80) hours of sick time off provided on their hire date and on January 1st of each year thereafter. Up to 80 hours of unused sick time will be carried forward from one calendar year to the next such that the maximum number of sick time hours an employee may have available is 160 hours. Employees in Illinois have a unique time off program designed specifically with local requirements in mind. All employees also have access to paid time away to deal with critical or emergency issues. We offer additional paid time to volunteer and give back to the community.


Employees on sales plans earn performance-based incentive pay on top of their base salary, which is split between quota and non-quota components. For quota-based incentive pay, Cisco typically pays as follows:


.75% of incentive target for each 1% of revenue attainment up to 50% of quota;


1.5% of incentive target for each 1% of attainment between 50% and 75%;


1% of incentive target for each 1% of attainment between 75% and 100%; and once performance exceeds 100% attainment, incentive rates are at or above 1% for each 1% of attainment with no cap on incentive compensation.


For non-quota-based sales performance elements such as strategic sales objectives, Cisco may pay up to 125% of target. Cisco sales plans do not have a minimum threshold of performance for sales incentive compensation to be paid.

title: Enterprise Account Manager (Nordics)
description:
**About the team**
------------------



The Enterprise Sales is a team of senior executive sales responsible for developing, managing and closing business within target large accounts in our Enterprise focused sales organisation. The Enterprise Account Managers (EAMs) are responsible for managing the sales process around the complete HashiCorp portfolio of software products to key account clients within a large territory (Nordics) focusing only on Enterprise customers with significant development operations tooling and process needs.


#### **What you will do (responsibilities):**


* Engage new and existing Open Source users of HashiCorp to provide value around how users can be more successful with our technology portfolio
* Proactively and efficiently manage resources with dedicated teams, virtual teams, and executive staff around opportunities to ensure successful outcomes
* Manage complex enterprise sales campaigns with multiple prospect engagement points in Development, IT Operations, and Security Operations
* Align the overall HashiCorp solution to the customer’s business needs, challenges, and technical requirements
* Execute solution and value selling to existing customer base and new prospects
* Articulate and evangelise the vision and positioning of both the company and products, and secure strategic commercial commitments
* Accurately forecast business on a quarterly cadence
* National and occasionally global travel required

#### **What you will need (basic qualifications):**


* Enterprise Sales and strategic customer development experience
* Track record in driving and closing large, complex deals
* Experience in creation and execution of quarterly and annual business plans
* Good executive presence, communication skills, and credibility
* Proven track record of consistently meeting or exceeding assigned annual/quarterly goals and targets
* Attentive to forecasting and business reporting responsibilities
* Knowledge of sales methodologies (such as MEDDPICC)
* Native-like Swedish language skills


**What is good to have (preferred qualifications):**


* Experience selling to accounts within the Public Sector
* Experience in Open Source Software business models
* Proficiency in concepts around Cloud and Infrastructure


#LI-Remote



#LI-CM1


**Life at HashiCorp**
---------------------


HashiCorp is driven by our people and our principles which have been the foundation of everything we do since the company was founded in 2012. Join us on our journey as we work to support the world's most innovative companies as they transition to cloud and multi-cloud infrastructure through simple yet powerful workflows and automation.
**About HashiCorp**
-------------------


At HashiCorp, we build the infrastructure that enables innovation. Our suite of multi-cloud infrastructure automation products are the underpinnings of the largest enterprises in the world, who rely on our solutions to provision, secure, connect, and run their critical applications to deliver crucial services, communications tools, and entertainment platforms to the world. We're building a once-in-a-generation infrastructure company with a unique approach rather than focusing on specific technologies, and we build products and solutions that support real-world workflows spanning the multiple cloud environments that nearly every organization worldwide is using today.



HashiCorp is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunities to qualified applicants and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, pregnancy, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, national origin, age, marital status, genetic information, disability, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws. We also consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records consistent with the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, the Los Angeles Fair Chance Ordinance, and other applicable state or local laws.



HashiCorp is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to qualified individuals with disabilities in our job application procedures. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, please reach out to benefits@hashicorp.com

title: Senior SEO Manager
description:
**Company Description**  

At Jellyfish, we believe in the power of diverse perspectives and inclusive collaboration. We welcome individuals who excel in collaborative, varied teams and value the unique contributions that each person brings to the table.


Jellyfish is a unique fusion of tech enthusiasts, creative minds, and data experts, all united to empower brands in their digital journey. Our passion for innovation and commitment to embracing diverse perspectives are at the heart of what we do. We excel at challenging the status quo, reinventing marketing norms, and crafting influential stories that resonate with global audiences. Join us in shaping a future where business growth and personal fulfillment go hand in hand.

 **Job Description**  

The Senior SEO Manager will be key in the understanding client strategy and execution of campaign tasks, keeping a close eye on time tracking versus allocated budget and supporting in the quality assurance of project deliverables. The seniority associated with this role means that frequent client contact via email, telephone or face-to-face meetings may be required.


Responsibilities

* Immersing yourself in client brands to enable you to identify the role that SEO will play in achieving goals and meeting KPIs
* As a senior team member, you will be expected to guide the team in understanding and interrogating client briefs sufficiently to improve final output
* Attending key campaign meetings (internal & client-facing) and positioning yourself as one of the team authorities - asking the right questions, providing answers and explanations to clients in a concise palatable manner, setting a good example to junior team members and translating meeting outcomes into actionable next steps when relevant to your discipline
* Leading in the development of sophisticated SEO strategies which accurately address the objectives of the client
* Ensuring that audits, research and landscape investigations are properly utilised to deliver insight-driven strategies
* Working alongside your client team’s SEO Manager/Executive or Analyst to position yourselves as the main authority for SEO activities across client campaigns for which you are responsible
* Working closely with internal SEO Managers, Content Managers and Account Managers to assist in the smooth implementation of client work
* Working closely with the Client Services and Project Management teams to develop integrated digital strategies for clients
* Identifying when team members are struggling in their understanding/delivery of tasks and either providing them with the support they require or finding an appropriate member of staff to do so
* Analysing the performance of campaigns, identifying strategic opportunities, facilitating change in order to hit and exceed client expectations and KPIs.
* Provide SEO training to internal teams and clients.
* Creating queries, dashboards and pulling data from Searchmetrics for the benefit of clients, the SEO Team and the wider staff.
* Engagement with Searchmetrics and other partners to ensure effective working relationships, access to insight and betas and to grow effectiveness of all campaigns.
* Producing client facing reports, studies and presentations to Jellyfish brand standards.
* Increasing your own and the agency’s knowledge in the field of Search
* Nurture and develop relationships with clients for the day-to-day requirements of SEO campaigns.
* Supporting the SEO Team in the delivery of their objectives and ensuring that teams are continually developing their digital and marketing expertise, and sharing a clear communication vision
* Develop a high level of SEO marketing expertise.
* Stay abreast of industry trends and all applicable technologies
* Achieving continuous improvement by proactively assessing Jellyfish practices and methods.
* Maintaining an in-depth understanding of Jellyfish’s marketplace, with particular emphasis on all new and emerging initiatives.

 **Qualifications*** Thorough experience and knowledge of working within Earned Media, with impeccable knowledge of monitoring and metrics
* Excellent knowledge of industry software & tools, including ahrefs, SEMrush, various rank tracking technologies, ScreamingFrog, Botify, Salesforce Commerce Cloud, Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Google Search Console, Looker Studio, Google AdWords (and more)
* Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and content management systems
* Highly competent in Google Sheets/Excel, Google Slides/Powerpoint, Google Docs/Word
* Strong communication skills, as you will be required to discuss project plans, strategies, and results with project leaders
* Excellent organisational skills are a must, as the role will require you to assist with multiple priorities, projects and relationships
* Creative and capable of conceptualising and executing unique ideas under pressure
* Confident in pitching and concisely communicating creative, strategic and professional ideas
* A self-motivated individual who consistently monitors their respective landscape in order to keep up to speed with industry developments, new tactics and thought leadership
* A natural intuition to understand what does or does not fit within a client’s brand ethics


Key Attributes

* Demonstrable ecommerce SEO experience
* Fluent English and Swedish - both at a high level
* Presentation skills
* Client relationship skills
* Exceptional attention to detail and pride in any work produced
* An unquestionable and relentless desire to learn new skills
* Ability to think and act independently as well as collaboratively
* Excellent communication and presentation of ideas, verbally and in writing
* Self-motivation and high levels of energy
* An outgoing personality and positive attitude with consistent levels of evident enthusiasm
* Flexibility, versatility, and ability to cope well under pressure
* Openness, honesty, and directness; is comfortable in giving and receiving constructive feedback
* High personal standards and promotion of them in others
* A sense of urgency and ownership of assigned responsibilities
* A strong work ethic

 **Additional Information**  

Join Jellyfish and experience a workplace where we prioritize your growth, celebrate your contributions, and empower you to tailor your work environment to suit your needs.


Reward: You'll receive a loyalty salary increase on your Jellyfish anniversary, in addition to joining our discretionary annual bonus scheme and 401k retirement plan.


Healthcare plans: Have peace of mind with our healthcare, vision and dental insurance, plus short and long-term disability and life cover.


Custom Work Environment: Work remotely for up to 60% of your days and shape your day between 8am. and 6:30pm with flexible working hours.


Growth, Your Way: Grow your career with one paid day each month for self-development and access to LinkedIn Learningwith unlimited online courses.


Family Support: Enjoy 14 weeks of paid leave for primary caregivers and 4 weeks of paid leave for secondary caregivers.

  

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

*Unfortunately, there has been an increase in fake recruiters impersonating Jellyfish and unlawfully using our brand name. If you are unsure if an email with a job offer you have received is genuinely from Jellyfish, or if you suspect any fraudulent activity, please report it to* *talentacquisition@jellyfish.com**.*

title: Strategic Brand Manager
description:
**Company Description** **Avery Dennison Corporation (NYSE: AVY)** is a global materials science and digital identification solutions company that provides a wide range of branding and information solutions that optimize labor and supply chain efficiency, reduce waste, advance sustainability, circularity, and transparency, and better connect brands and consumers. Our products and solutions include labeling and functional materials, radio frequency identification (RFID) inlays and tags, software applications that connect the physical and digital, and a variety of products and solutions that enhance branded packaging and carry or display information that improves the customer experience. Serving an array of industries worldwide — including home and personal care, apparel, general retail, e-commerce, logistics, food and grocery, pharmaceuticals, and automotive — we employ approximately 35,000 employees in more than 50 countries. Our reported sales in 2023 were $8.4 billion. Learn more at**www.averydennison.com**.


Learn more at https://apparelsolutions.averydennison.com/en

*Please let us know if we can support you with reasonable accommodations throughout the application process by contacting our Talent Acquisition team via* *Requestaccomodation@eu.averydennison.com**.*

 **Job Description** **About the Role:**


We're looking for a dynamic, self-motivated, and detail-oriented Strategic Brand Manager to make a significant impact on our brand's presence in the apparel industry. In this role, you'll use your expertise, creativity, and strategic thinking to drive business growth and client satisfaction. This position requires someone who can lead complex projects, define program needs, manage sales processes from start to finish, and build strong client relationships. You will play a key role in developing and implementing brand strategies that align with our overall business objectives.

**Responsibilities:**

* Cultivate and strengthen client relationships by responding to inquiries and providing comprehensive information about our services.
* Manage the product development process from initial client discussions to final product approval, launch, and order fulfillment.
* Oversee all sales activities, including inventory tracking, client sales reporting, and product development monitoring using digital tools like Oracle SalesCloud, Oracle Commerce Cloud, Eloqua, and other pricing and product specification systems.
* Develop and present global pricing proposals and manage price approvals in competitive bidding situations.
* Stay informed about industry trends and product innovations.
* Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities and threats.
* Analyze brand performance and provide recommendations for improvement.
* Collaborate with marketing and communications teams to ensure consistent brand messaging across all channels

 **Qualifications*** Experience in the apparel industry, product management, or similar roles.
* Proven abilities in customer service, communication, and presentations.
* Demonstrated success in managing multiple projects and meeting deadlines.
* Proficiency in technical and digital tools, including Google Suite, ERP systems (Oracle preferred), pricing tools, and product/customer databases.
* Strong data analysis skills to inform decision-making; comfortable with quantitative analysis and presenting data insights.
* Skilled at building and maintaining positive relationships with clients and partners.
* A flexible and adaptable approach with a desire to learn, grow, and take on new challenges within a global Fortune 500 company.

 **Additional Information**  

Additional information

**Who we are! - Our Story:**

**Each of us, Every day!** **Eight Values****. One Team!**


We understand diversity and equal opportunities as enrichment for our future-oriented work at Avery Dennison. With us, teams are balanced and diverse. Because each of us is unique, and we appreciate bringing together different personalities and talents.


Avery Dennison is an equal-opportunity employer. You are interested in knowing more about our Diversity & Inclusion approach? Please go to**averydennison.com/en/home/about-us/diversity-and-inclusion.html**


At Avery Dennison, we do what we love, and we love what we do - Just click here, and get us to know even better: **Life @ Avery Dennison (****linkedin.com/company/avery-dennison/life/emea****)**

title: Konsultenhetschef inom AI
description:
**Vill du jobba med ledarskap och älskar att göra affärer inom AI-området? På Combitech i Stockholm söker vi nu en konsultenhetschef som kan leda vårt innovativa AI-team. Om du vill forma framtidens AI-lösningar och samtidigt utveckla dina ledaregenskaper i en dynamisk och stödjande miljö, är detta möjligheten för dig.**

**Vad vi erbjuder**
-------------------


På Combitech får du i din vardag göra skillnad för människor, verksamheter och samhälle. Vi erbjuder utmaningar i det digitaliserade samhällets absoluta framkant. Hos oss får du möjlighet att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar både personlig och professionell utveckling samt trygghet och balans i livet.


Vi tror att man gör ett bättre jobb om man kan fokusera på rätt saker, därför gör vi det lätt att kombinera jobbet med vardagen. Vi satsar på våra medarbetare, de utgör kärnan, hjärnan och hjärtat i vår verksamhet. Dessutom står vi på en stadig grund av högteknologi, forskning och anställningstrygghet med försvars- och säkerhetskoncernen Saab som ägare.

**Vad rollen innebär**
----------------------


Som konsultenhetschef inom affärsområde Applied Analytics får du möjlighet att arbeta med att utveckla våra spetskompetenser och utforma våra tjänster inom AI-området. Applied Analytics är ett relativt nystartat affärsområde inom Combitech som erbjuder AI-lösningar där vi hjälper våra kunder att effektivisera sina processer, öka sin säkerhet och bidra till ett mer hållbart samhälle.


Vi utvecklar också egna innovativa AI-applikationer som kan integreras i kundernas produkter/IT-plattformar eller erbjudas som separata system. Några exempel på detta är t.ex.:

* Automatiserade mätsystem för kvalitetskontroller baserade på ”computer vision”- teknik.
* Generativa AI-lösningar (chatbots) baserade på on-prem eller cloud-baserade språkmodeller för granskning, kravanalys, översättning samt sökning i dokument och databaser.


I rollen som konsultenhetschef delar du tiden mellan att leda din konsultenhet och medarbetare och att själv jobba som konsult vilket gör att du kan utvecklas som ledare utan att tappa närheten till tekniken.


Det finns goda möjligheter för dig att spela en nyckelroll i att identifiera och utveckla affärsmöjligheter inom AI-området. Du har chansen att bygga och upprätthålla starka kundrelationer, och ditt strategiska tänkande kan bidra till att forma och implementera affärsstrategier som främjar vår tillväxt och innovation.

**Då tjänsten innebär arbete som omfattas av försvarssekretess krävs det att du genomför och godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.**

**Låter det intressant? Skicka in din ansökan direkt! Urvalet sker efter sista ansökningsdagen.**

**Vad vi söker**
----------------


Du har i grunden en teknisk utbildning på högskole-, eller universitetsnivå och har därutöver hunnit få en god erfarenhet av yrkeslivets förutsättningar och utmaningar. Du får gärna ha en stark bakgrund inom AI och maskininlärning, erfarenhet av att arbeta med teknologier som "computer vision" och generativa AI-modeller samt förståelse för IT-plattformar och integration av AI-lösningar. Du har tidigare kanske varit teamlead eller i alla fall trivs i ledande roller, alternativt ser du rollen som ledare som ett naturligt nästa steg i din karriär.


Som konsultenhetschef är du en viktig kulturbärare på Combitech och vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Vi söker dig som är engagerad, lyhörd och utåtriktad med stor ansvarskänsla. Då kompetensutveckling är en kärnfråga hos oss ser vi gärna att du har ett coachande förhållningssätt och ett genuint intresse att ge stöd åt dina medarbetare att utvecklas utifrån sina förutsättningar och förmågor. Samarbete över olika avdelningar och med kunder är en central del av rollen, vilket kräver en stark förmåga att anpassa din kommunikationsstil efter olika målgrupper och sammanhang.


Vi söker dig som tycker att det är spännande att vara med att bygga något nytt tillsammans med dedikerade och passionerade kollegor. Här är det högt i tak och vi är ständigt under förändring då vår vardag hela tiden förändras med kundernas behov och önskemål. Vi diskuterar oavbrutet nya tekniker och områden för att kunna hjälpa våra kunder att möta nya utmaningar och förutsättningar. En del av vår strategi är att jobba med att tillföra kunskap och tjänster för ett hållbart och tryggt digitalt samhälle.


Oavsett bransch arbetar samtliga våra kunder med avancerad teknik och drivs av den tekniska utmaningen, något vi hoppas även du gör!

**Rekryterande chef:** Johnny Larsson, johnny.larsson@combitech.com

 *Vi undanber oss rekryteringssamarbeten.*

title: Junior Systems Engineer - Linux
description:
**About the Role:**  

OSTTRA Sweden
  
  

**The Role :** Systems Engineer - Linux
  
  

**The Team:** The OSTTRA Technology team is composed of Capital Markets Technology professionals, who build, support and protect the applications that operate our network. The technology landscape includes high-performance, high-volume applications as well as compute intensive applications, leveraging contemporary micro services, cloud-based architectures
  
  

**The Impact:** Together , we build, support, protect and manage high-performance, resilient platforms that process more than 100 million messages a day. Our services are vital to automated trade processing around the globe, managing peak volumes and working with our customers and regulators to ensure the efficient settlement of trades and effective operation of global capital markets
  
  

**What’s in it for you:** We are looking for highly motivated technology professionals who will strengthen our specialisms and champion our uniqueness to create a company that is collaborative, respectful, and inclusive to all.
  
  

**Responsibilities:**  

Install and maintain all server hardware and software systems and administer all server performance and ensure availability for same.
  
  

Help troubleshoot problems with Linux servers, running different versions of Linux, including Red Hat and Rocky Linux. Engage in continuous testing of new Linux versions and applications on an on-demand basis.
  
  

Design and maintain all system tools for all scripts and automation processes and monitor all capacity planning.
  
  

Install and maintain servers. Help automate server maintenance, including running scripts and automated processes.
  
  

Monitor everyday systems and evaluate availability of all server resources and perform all activities for Linux servers.
  
  

Maintain and monitor all system frameworks and provide after call support to all systems and maintain optimal Linux knowledge.
  
  

Assist with user management, such as creating accounts for new hires and training seasoned professionals on company policies.
  
  

Perform change control.
  
  

Maintain server uptime and network performance.
  
  

Assist with server documentation.
  
  

Maintain server security.
  
  

**What We’re Looking For:**  

Degree in Computer Science, IT, or equivalent area of technical study.
  
  

Minimum 6 years of Industry experience with Linux OS (RHEL, Rocky Linux etc).
  
  

Installing, monitoring and upgrading Linux system software on company servers and computers.
  
  

Applying patches and upgrades when necessary.
  
  

Assisting in resolution of hardware/software platform problems in complex, multi-layered environment.
  
  

Analyzing impact of software changes across other functional units.
  
  

Establish, implement, and record Linux Administrator best practices.
  
  

Implementing and managing system to proactively monitor infrastructure.
  
  

Specialty in RHEL 7, 8 and 9 systems
  
  

Strong familiarity with Infrastructure as Code tools such as Ansible, Terraform and Puppet
  
  

Experience with Red Hat rgmanager and/or Pacemaker clusters is a must.
  
  

Maintain responsibility for racking/deracking servers and network connections.
  
  

Creating and setting standardized backup and recovery policies, as well as security policies.
  
  

Making recommendations for upgrades to hardware and software based on existing operations, pending needs and available budget.
  
  

Familiarity with multiple information technologies that include server virtualization, cloud based infrastructure, automation, VMWare and AWS.
  
  

Familiarity with high availability, disaster recovery, LDAP and load balancer concepts is a plus.
  
  

Experience with troubleshooting and support Java JBoss applications is a plus.
  
  

Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always- available service is preferred.
  
  

**The Location:** Stockholm, Sweden
  
  

**About Company Statement:**  

OSTTRA is a market leader in derivatives post-trade processing, bringing innovation, expertise, processes and networks together to solve the post-trade challenges of global financial markets. OSTTRA operates cross-asset post-trade processing networks, providing a proven suite of Credit Risk, Trade Workflow and Optimisation services. Together these solutions streamline post-trade workflows, enabling firms to connect to counterparties and utilities, manage credit risk, reduce operational risk and optimise processing to drive post-trade efficiencies.
  
  

OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. These businesses have an exemplary track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure and bring together an established community of market participants comprising all trading relationships and paradigms, connected using powerful integration and transformation capabilities.
  
  

About OSTTRA
  
  

Candidates should note that OSTTRA is an independent firm, jointly owned by S&P Global and CME Group. As part of the joint venture, S&P Global provides recruitment services to OSTTRA - however, successful candidates will be interviewed and directly employed by OSTTRA, joining our global team of more than 1,200 post trade experts.
  
  

OSTTRA was formed in 2021 through the combination of four businesses that have been at the heart of post trade evolution and innovation for the last 20+ years: MarkitServ, Traiana, TriOptima and Reset. OSTTRA is a joint venture, owned 50/50 by S&P Global and CME Group.
  
With an outstanding track record of developing and supporting critical market infrastructure, our combined network connects thousands of market participants to streamline end to end workflows - from trade capture at the point of execution, through portfolio optimization, to clearing and settlement.
  
Joining the OSTTRA team is a unique opportunity to help build a bold new business with an outstanding heritage in financial technology, playing a central role in supporting global financial markets.
  
  

Learn more at www.osttra.com .
  
  

What’s In It For You?
  
  

**Benefits:**  

We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S&P Global.
  
  

**Our benefits include:**  

**Health & Wellness:** Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
  
  

**Flexible Downtime:** Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
  
  

**Continuous Learning:** Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
  
  

**Invest in Your Future:** Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
  
  

**Family Friendly Perks:** It’s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families.
  
  

**Beyond the Basics:** From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.
  
**For more information on benefits by country visit:** https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries
  
  

-----------------------------------------------------------
  
  

Equal Opportunity Employer
  
S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
  
  

If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
  
  

**US Candidates Only:** The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision - https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay-transp\_%20English\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
  
  

----------------------------------------------------------- 20 - Professional (EEO-2 Job Categories-United States of America), BSMGMT203 - Entry Professional (EEO Job Group)

**Posted On:** 2024-12-17
  
**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden

title: Erfaren kommunikatör med fokus på samhällsbyggnad och stadsutveckling
description:
Uddevalla – en plats för hela livet Välkommen att bli en del av vår växande kommun - och att tillsammans med oss arbeta för att ge våra kommuninvånare ännu bättre service. Vi erbjuder en attraktiv arbetsplats som ger dig stora möjligheter att utvecklas i din yrkesroll. Vårt mål är att alla ska kunna trivas och växa - under ett helt yrkesliv. Vi vill också utvecklas som arbetsgivare och arbetar aktivt för att på bästa sätt ta till vara på din kunskap och ditt engagemang. Vi uppskattar och uppmuntrar till medskapande från alla. Uddevalla kommun är en vacker plats vid havet i hjärtat av Bohuslän. Vi tror på ett öppet och positivt samspel mellan kommun, utbildning, näringsliv och kultur. Vi hoppas att du kommer att trivas hos oss!

**Behovet av bra och tydlig kommunikation ökar hela tiden och nu behöver vi förstärka vår kommunikationsavdelning med ytterligare en stjärna. Har du erfarenhet av kommunikation, pr och marknadsföring och söker en ny och spännande utmaning med fokus på samhällsbyggnad och stadsutveckling så kan det vara precis dig vi söker!**

**Vad erbjuder vi?**
--------------------


För det första så erbjuder vi ett roligt, meningsfullt och omväxlande arbete med positiva, stöttande och härliga kollegor! Dessutom får du möjlighet att vara en viktig länk mellan samhällsbyggnad och kommunikation och arbeta med några av Uddevalla kommuns största projekt och satsningar.

**Om jobbet**
-------------


Du arbetar tätt tillsammans med dina kommunikatörskollegor men du kommer ha ett extra fokus mot vår samhällsbyggnadsförvaltning och våra stadsutvecklingsprojekt. Med hjälp av dina kollegor på kommunikationsenheten kommer du strategiskt och operativt leda arbetet med att lyfta och kommunicera de projekt och satsningar som görs där. Du ska även fungera som ett extra stöd till förvaltningen när det gäller kommunikationsplanering, kommunikationsstrategier samt frågor kopplat till press och media.
  

  

Utöver detta kommer du tillsammans med dina kollegor på avdelningen vara en del av det dagliga arbetet med kommunens externa och interna kommunikation, i alla våra kanaler. Det kan till exempel innebära att skriva nyhets- och informationstexter, fotografera, göra film, uppdatera våra hemsidor, arbeta med event och kampanjer samt kommunikationsplanering och -rådgivning, internt och externt. Vi hjälps åt för att skapa så bra intern och extern kommunikation som möjligt för våra medborgare och kollegor!


Vi i Uddevalla kommun har många fantastiska och spännande projekt och satsningar på gång och vi hoppas att du är den som kan hjälpa oss att bli ännu bättre på att lyfta dessa och informera våra medborgare, företag, besökare och media om allt bra vi gör!

**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------

* Strategiskt och operativt leda arbetet med att lyfta, marknadsföra och informera om projekt och satsningar inom samhällsbyggnad och stadsutveckling
* Stödja samhällsbyggnadsförvaltning med kommunikationsplanering och kommunikationsstrategi
* Skriva pressmeddelanden och fungera som rådgivare och stöd i frågor kopplat till press och media
* Arbeta aktivt med media och Public relations (PR) kring våra projekt och satsningar
* Skriva och svara på debattartiklar, krönikor med mera

**Vi tror att du är**
---------------------

* En erfaren stjärna inom kommunikation, marknadsföring och Public relations (PR)
* Van att hantera press och media
* Ambitiös och vill vara med och påverka – både på arbetsplatsen och i samhället i stort
* Har ett omvärldsintresse och en naturlig nyfikenhet på politik, samhälle och stadsutveckling
* Är trygg i en rådgivande roll
* Är en duktig skribent och klarar av att skriva olika typer av text
* Är noggrann, självgående, kreativ och idérik
* Är en strategisk person som tycker om att motivera och inspirera andra
* Är en lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta tillsammans med andra och inte har några problem att hjälpa till där det behövs

**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------

* Högskoleexamen inom kommunikation, marknadsföring, Public relations (PR), journalistik eller liknande utbildning/erfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdigt
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att arbeta inom marknadsföring och Public relations (PR)
* Erfarenhet av att hantera press och media och stötta ledningen i press-relaterade frågor
* Kunskap om lagar och regler kopplade till digital kommunikation, till exempel Dataskyddsförodningen (GDPR), Lagen om tillgänglighet till digital offentlig service, Upphovsrätt
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att arbeta med program inom Adobe Creative Cloud och Office-paketet


Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en politiskt styrd organisation är en fördel men vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.


Anställning sker under förutsättning att erforderliga beslut fattas. För tjänster där arbetet innebär direkt och regelbunden kontakt med barn och ungdomar, samt för verksamhet inom LSS, vård- och omsorg, hälso-och sjukvård, psykiatrisk vård och missbruksvård, ska giltigt utdrag ur polisens belastningsregister visas upp alternativt lämnas in före anställning. Tänk på att det kan ta tid att få utdraget så beställ det i god tid för att rekryteringsprocessen inte ska fördröjas. När du söker ett jobb hos oss sparas din ansökan. Det beror på att vi är en offentlig verksamhet. Din ansökan blir en allmän handling när vi har mottagit den. Det innebär att ansökningshandlingar och information om vem som sökt en tjänst kan begäras ut av den som vill. Om du har skyddad identitet ska du inte göra din ansökan digitalt utan kontakta den som står som kontaktperson i annonsen. För dig som inte är medborgare inom EU/EES-området krävs arbetstillstånd, detta gäller inte dig som har permanent uppehållstillstånd. Arbetstillståndet ska uppvisas vid intervjutillfället. Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.

title: Platform Architect
description:
At Sandvik Coromant Data Office, we’re looking for a tech-savvy Platform Architect to join our dynamic and multi-cultural team. We offer you the opportunity to grow and develop while working with cutting edge technology and data platforms in an innovative and global environment.
Shortly about the team
The Data Office democratizes data, analytics, AI, and automation for all Sandvik Coromant teams through self-services, data literacy, and data products. We deliver pragmatic and inclusive digital solutions, organized in a federated way to ensure predictability and transparency. Our team of experts in data, analytics, automation, and AI is driven by a strong engineering spirit and a commitment to teamwork, leading by example in technology and product-driven methodologies. Welcome to us!
Your mission
Your primary responsibility is to evolve, operate and maintain our Data and Analytics (DAA) platforms, where you take responsibility for all architecture-related decisions and questions. You lead the technical maintenance and development of the platform, ensuring that technical decisions are cost-effective and compliant. Naturally, you stay updated with innovative technology developments to keep our platform fit for purpose. You work closely with our product owners, analysts, data architects and developers to successfully develop the DAA platforms.
Included in your responsibilities:* Translating the business requirements into fit-for-purpose architecture.
* Ensure compliance, security, availability and responsiveness of the platform.
* Taking ownership of the architecture roadmap.
* Communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Take accountability to establish platform processes – enabling the diverse engineering team members to deliver within the platform.
* Secure the architecture framework and support our Data Architect on the engineering framework.


The location for this position is preferably in Sandviken or Stockholm, other locations in Sweden could also be an option. We offer you a hybrid work solution.
Your profile
We’re looking for someone with solid experience from a technology engineering role. You have proven hands-on experience with cloud computing service providers, preferably Microsoft Azure. Your previous assignments have also given you profound knowledge of Lakehouse technology and service providers, where knowledge of Databricks is a plus. We believe that your knowledge is backed by a relevant university degree. Acting in a truly global environment calls for fluency in English. Knowledge of Swedish is a plus.
Your personality makes us better! You’re a structured individual who always has the best interest of the business in mind. Creating trustworthy collaborations is one of your strengths, and you use your strong communication skills to share information and knowledge to increase our common expertise and reach our shared goals.
Our culture
Innovation is in our DNA and we’re proud to shape the future of manufacturing in close collaboration with our customers and partners. We believe in an inclusive, equal and open-minded culture, and we nurture our diversities to form a solid foundation for achieving great results. Add fair and rewarding benefits, as well as many different career opportunities in an inspiring global environment. Meet some of your future colleagues at our career page or visit our website, LinkedIn or Facebook page to get to know us further.

title: Power Electronics Engineer till kund
description:
Tog du nyligen en civilingenjörsexamen inom elektronik och vill arbeta med kraftelektronik (Power Electronics)? Vår kundsöker nu en nyexaminerad civilingenjörmed intresse för utveckling av HVDC-teknologier.Rollen är kopplad till ett talangprogram som ger dig den ultimata övergången mellan studier och arbetsliv.
  
  

Att jobba med Power Electronics hos kundI detta talangprogram kommer du somHigh Voltage Power Electronics Valve Development Engineer få chansen att fokusera på utveckling av HVDC-teknologier för att möjliggöra långdistansöverföring av elektricitet, inklusive förnybar energi. Arbetsuppgifterna inkluderar elektriska beräkningar, simuleringar, kraftelektronikstester, samt samarbete med tvärfunktionella team.
  
Rollen innebär att utföra beräkningar och simuleringar för att analysera elektrisk belastning på komponenter samt specificera och genomföra kraftelektroniktester i samarbete med testavdelningen eller externa testanläggningar. Du arbetar i tvärfunktionella team för att utveckla nya teknologier, hantera risker och dokumentera resultat i tekniska rapporter och presentationer. Uppgifterna utförs i enlighet med kundens kärnvärden för säkerhet och integritet.
  
Rollen är placerad i Ludvika.
  
  

Att vara konsult på Nexer Tech Talent
  
Nexer Tech Talent är specialister på att ge unga techtalanger den ultimata starten på arbetslivet. För denna roll kommer du att bli anställd av Nexer Tech Talent men arbeta hos kundi Ludvikamed start i januari.Du kommer även att få ta del av ett skräddarsytt utbildningsprogram där du får möjlighet att utveckla och fördjupa dina tekniska kunskaper i områden som AI, Cloud och cybersäkerhet,men även inom tex. ledarskap och personlig utveckling.
  
Du kommer att coachas av en mentor hos kundsamt en konsultchef på Nexer Tech Talent. Som konsult hos oss blir du väl omhändertagen och bjuds ofta in på gemensamma aktiviteter så som föreläsningar, afterwork och lunchträffar. Efter framgångsrikt genomförande av konsultuppdraget är intentionen att du erbjuds en anställning hos kund.
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

Är i början av din karriär och har en civilingenjörsexameninom elektronik (Power Electronics)
  
Har ett intresse för beräkningar, simuleringar, kraftelektronik
  
Som person är driven, initiativtagande och kommunikativ
  
Har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska
  
Har goda kunskaper i Matlab och Comsol
  
  

Ansökan
  
Låter detta som något för dig? Vi arbetar löpande med rekryteringen, så skicka in din ansökan snarast möjligt. Om du har du frågor eller funderingar är du välkommen att kontakta Tech Recruiter Olivia Holm på olivia.holm@nexergroup.com.
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  
  

Om Nexer Tech Talent
  
  

Nexer Tech Talent är en del av Nexer Group – ett techbolag med djupa rötter i svenskt entreprenörskap och innovation. Tillsammans är vi över 2500 medarbetare i 15 länder som i mer än 35 år hjälpt våra kunder att ligga steget före både strategiskt, teknologiskt och kommunikativt. Läs mer om Nexer Tech Talent här.

title: Security Architect
description:
*Are you a Security Architect passionate about designing secure frameworks and ensuring compliance with industry standards? Do you want to work with cutting-edge technology in an inclusive and innovative environment – and help save lives on the road?*  

  

*Apply today – no CV needed! Just share your name, email, and phone number, and we’ll take care of the rest.*

### **Insights from the Team**


Our team is dedicated to delivering secure and safe software for advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) and autonomous driving (AD). We work at the forefront of automotive cybersecurity, ensuring our solutions meet the highest safety and security standards. Collaboration and innovation drive our mission to make roads safer for everyone.

### **Your Mission and Day-to-Day Tasks**


As a Security Architect, you will:

* Develop and maintain a Security Framework integrated with systems like Safety and Quality.
* Implement and enhance Cybersecurity Management Systems (CSMS) aligned with industry standards.
* Lead risk analysis, threat modeling, and mitigation strategies.
* Provide technical leadership in secure software development practices, including SSDLC.
* Monitor and address emerging cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities.
* Collaborate with suppliers and OEMs to ensure cybersecurity compliance.
* Drive security awareness programs and training.

### **What’s in It for You**

* Work at the forefront of tech in one of Sweden’s most dynamic AI/ML companies.
* Collaborate with highly skilled, innovative, and creative people.
* Influence cutting-edge automotive security frameworks.
* Enjoy a flexible work approach and a strong work-life balance.

### **Qualifications & Experience**

**Essential Experience**

* Expertise in automotive cybersecurity standards (ISO/SAE 21434, UNECE WP.29).
* Proficiency in TARA, secure coding, cryptography, and security testing tools.
* 5+ years in cybersecurity, preferably in automotive or ADAS domains.
* Experience in embedded systems and cloud security.

**Nice to Have, but absolutely not a must!**

* Familiarity with regulatory compliance and agile development environments.
* Degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity, or related fields.
* Experience in vehicle manufacturing or related industries.

### **More About Zenseact**


Our software makes a difference. Using AI-based technology to create the ultimate driver support, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Every year, around 1.4 million people die in traffic, while approximately 50 million people get injured. Many get disabled as a result of their injuries. We can do better.

#### **One Purpose, One Product**


We’re a software company dedicated to revolutionizing car safety. By designing the complete software stack for autonomous driving and advanced driver-assistance systems, we’re fighting to end car accidents and make roads safe for everyone. Founded by Volvo Cars, our teams are based in Gothenburg and Lund, Sweden, Munich in Germany and Shanghai, China. Through regular software updates, we aim to make cars safer long after production, accelerating improvement loops and deploying cutting-edge software efficiently.

#### **Culture with People at Heart**


Achieving our mission requires us to venture into the unknown, pioneering new technology and pushing the frontier of autonomous driving. While determination and expertise drive us, unity and support ensure our success. Our **people-at-heart culture** fosters belonging, well-being, and the flexibility to thrive both personally and professionally. Diversity and inclusion are core to our innovation, and we value differences in gender, race, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation, and age.


Interviews are held continuously, so we highly recommend submitting your application at your earliest convenience.

title: Senior Elektronikutvecklare
description:
Ansök nu


Etteplan är ett ledande ingenjörsföretag som formar framtidens industrier. Vi är över 4000 teknikspecialister som brinner för teknik och människor. Tillsammans formar vi framtidens innovationer och utveckling inom en global affärsmiljö.


Vi söker passionerade teknikexperter. Trivs du i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där innovation är del av vardagen? Då kan den här rollen vara något för dig!



Din roll



I rollen som senior elektronikkonstruktör kommer du att arbeta i team med projektets alla delar, från tidig designspecifikation till utprovning i fält hos kunderna. Majoriteten av våra projekt bedrivs i egna lokaler i Mjärdevi Science Park vilket ger extra energi och inspiration i arbetet, och den stora variationen gör att du snabbt utvecklar både kompetens och helhetsförståelse. Här finns även ett väl utrustat elektroniklabb som kontinuerligt utvecklas, och det är förväntat att du kan hugga i och vara hands on med t.ex. lödning och kablage när projekten kräver det.



Våra uppdrag innefattar främst utveckling av elektronikprodukter innehållande sensorer, motorstyrningar samt trådlösa kommunikationslösningar mot både app och cloud. Vi är en strategisk R&D partner till våra kunder inom industri, vilket innebär att majoriteten av våra projekt bedrivs inhouse, men vi stöttar även kunderna direkt i deras miljö när det krävs.


Din profil



För just denna roll söker vi dig med som är en erfaren elektronikingenjör som kan tillhandahålla teknisk expertis på hög nivå och bidrar till våra utvecklingsinitiativ och projekt. Du kommer även fungera som mentor för mindre erfarna medarbetare och det finns även möjlighet att agera projektledare i mindre projekt eller med att arbetsleda uppgifter i större projekt.



Vi värderar dina personliga färdigheter högt och ser gärna att du är självgående och tar ett stort ansvar, med stor lyhördhet och förståelse för kundens behov. Vi ser gärna att du är en lagspelare och en innovativ glädjespridare som inte backar för att ta ansvar. Det är viktigt att du är naturligt nyfiken och intresserad av att bidra även utanför sitt specifika fokusområde.


För att trivas i rollen och möta förväntningarna i din roll som senior elektronikingenjör ser vi att du:


* Har en akademisk utbildning på högskole-/civilingenjörsexamen eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Har minst 8 års erfarenhet inom elektronikkonstruktion inom inbyggda system/embedded HW, både analog och digital.
* Känner dig bekväm med att rita kretsschema med E-CAD verktyg som tex Altium, Pads, OrCad, DipTrace eller Eagle.
* Har arbetat aktivt med kravhantering.
* Har arbetat med testplanering och verifiering av kretskort.
* Har praktisk erfarenhet av mätteknik, tex Oscilloskop, spektrumanalysator, VNA.
* Har goda kunskaper inom regulatorik kopplat till elektronikutveckling.



Har du även erfarenhet av något enligt nedan är det meriterande:


* Programmering av inbyggda system/embedded, hårdvarunära C.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i elektronikföretag/labb.
* Simulering av elektroniksystem tex Ads, Feko eller Ansys.
* Design av RF-elektronik.
* Tester enl tex EMC/LVD/RED.
* Felläge och effektanalys enl DFMEA
* Konfigurationshantering, CM.
* B-Körkort



Känner du att Etteplan är rätt för dig? Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt team!



Årsskiftet brukar vara en överlastad period när vi har många annonser publicerade över ledigheten och därmed även har många sökande, därför kan det ta längre tid för oss att återkoppla till dig om din status i din rekryteringsprocess. Vi tackar dig för din förståelse och ditt tålamod!

title: AI Engineering Intern
description:
Nordiska is a financial tech company that's building the next generation cloud-based platform for financial services in Europe. Our innovative platform empowers partners to provide in-house financial services to their customers seamlessly with our APIs and plug-and-play technology. Our platform is designed to facilitate all forms of ideas, irrespective of the market or volume. If you're interested in being a part of our fast-growing team and help shape the future of financial services, apply to join us today! We are currently looking for an AI Engineering Intern to join our Data & Analytics team in Stockholm. Note that this role can be adjusted to fit your current study situation, so part/full time are both options.

**We offer**


We offer a chance to be part of a positive and engaged community where everyone's contribution is important to our growth and success. As a part of Nordiska, you will receive the necessary conditions and support to develop within your own area of expertise, as well as learn about other parts of the business to advance within the company. We provide a fast-paced, open, and motivating work environment with skilled colleagues, where everyone collaborates to achieve our goals together.

**About the role**


As AI Engineering Intern you will be part of our Data & Analytics team, operating within a cutting-edge, cloud-based environment. In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on our AI projects, contributing to the development and enhancement of our innovative financial platform. You will collaborate with engineers, gaining hands-on experience in solving real life problems by applying generative AI. This internship will provide you with a unique chance to grow your skills in a fast-paced, supportive environment, and make a tangible impact on our products and services.

**Requirements**

* Currently pursuing or recently completed a Master's degree in a technical field such as engineering or computer science.
* Strong foundation in machine learning algorithms and statistical analysis.
* Proficiency in a programming language such as Python, C#, Scala or similar.
* Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and a keen interest in generative AI and machine learning.
* Strong communication skills, both in Swedish and English.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.

**Nice to have**

* Prior experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
* Knowledge of OpenAI’s GPT models.
* Knowledge of financial services and fintech industry trends.
* Understanding of big data technologies and tools.


At Nordiska, we're passionate about building the next generation of cloud-based financial services, and we're seeking a talented AI Engineering Intern to join us. If you're someone who loves working with technology and thrives in a fast-paced environment, we'd love to hear from you!

 **Contact**


For more information contact Filip Björnsjö on +46 (0) 73 543 22 44 or filip.bjornsjo@nordiska.com

title: Project Coordinator
description:
Aivivid is a digital security company that delivers tailored IT infrastructure and cybersecurity solutions to a global client base. We specialize in designing, deploying, and managing secure, resilient digital environments that meet the unique needs of each client. Our team of experts leverages cutting-edge technologies to monitor, manage, and protect our customers' networks from evolving threats.
  
We are currently seeking a Project Coordinator to join our team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in coordinating projects, managing budgets, and engaging with various stakeholders to support our delivery of managed and unmanaged cloud infrastructure. This opportunity is ideal for a detail-oriented professional, an analytical mindset, and a passion for cybersecurity and AI. Join us and help drive innovation in a fast-growing industry.
  
In this role, your contributions will ensure smooth project operations, alignment with client needs, and the effective delivery of our managed and unmanaged cloud infrastructure.
  
What You’ll Do
  
Coordinate projects by planning, organizing, and managing schedules, resources, and deadlines to ensure timely delivery and alignment with company goals.
  
Serve as the primary point of contact for project updates, providing status reports to internal and external stakeholders, and ensuring team members are aware of critical milestones.
  
Support stakeholders by actively communicating project progress, addressing their needs, and fostering engagement through project-related communities.
  
Manage project documentation, including agreements, financial records, and operational reports, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
  
Oversee project budgets by tracking expenses, preparing financial reports, and coordinating with external accounting firms for bookkeeping and tax purposes.
  
Handle logistics such as managing supplies, coordinating shipping, and resolving practical issues for clients and the team.
  
Ensure quality assurance by tracking project milestones, updating documentation, and collaborating with clients, subcontractors, and engineering teams to maintain high standards.
  
  

You Are
  
**Technically Skilled:** Proficient in offline and online productivity software (e.g., LibreOffice, Microsoft Office, Office 365) and experienced with project management tools like Basecamp, Trello, or Jira.
  
**Knowledgeable in IT and Design:** Background in AI or network security is preferred.
  
**Effective Communicator:** Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Persian (Farsi), with a strong ability to share knowledge and work collaboratively as a team player.
  
**Proactive and Adaptable:** A proactive learner with a drive to develop IT skills, adapt to different workflows, and maintain curiosity and self-motivation.
  
**Organized and Detail-Oriented:** Skilled in writing and analyzing detailed reports, prioritizing multiple tasks, and managing projects independently or collaboratively.
  
**Resilient Under Pressure:** Able to handle stress effectively while ensuring smooth execution and delivery of projects.
  
**Additional Qualifications:** A Swedish driver’s license.
  
  

Why Join Us?
  
Join a forward-thinking team in cybersecurity, where you’ll work in a flexible, collaborative environment. You’ll have the freedom to experiment with different techniques on diverse projects, promoting both professional growth and innovation.
  
To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter in English, demonstrating your skills and interest in the role. Note that this position is based in Stockholm and requires in-person participation in meetings, training, and conferences. If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us.

title: Level 2 Threathunter (Crowdstrike Identity Cloud)
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a** **Crowdstrike** **focused** **Threat Analyst L2** **to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Managed Security Services business unit.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**

Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 300 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Level 2 Threathunter who wants to make a difference in our Managed Security Services.

##### **Managed Security Services**

Truesec helps customers globally with Attack Prediction Services, Vulnerability Management Services and Managed Detection & Response services for IT and OT environments. Our services are all delivered by skilled security analysis teams that conducts 24/7 attack monitoring, threat hunting, threat intelligence analysis, and threat remediation. Our team of experts works tirelessly to identify and prevent cyber breaches, and to help increase our customers’ proactive cybersecurity defenses. Our goal is to be an extension of our customers’ IT organizations, customizing a combination of capabilities and tooling, tailored to prevent cyber attacks in the most efficient way.




##### **The Role**

As a Threat Analyst L2 in the Threat Analyst and Detection Engineering team at Truesec you will work with a wide range of assignments, including analysis and investigation of the most advanced and complex attacks, detection engineering activities, and service enhancements in specific focus areas. As a Threat Analyst L2 at Truesec you are expected to have one or more focus areas where you excel in expertise utilized for both internal and external engagements. For this particular position we are looking for someone with extensive Crowdstrike experience.


Within this role you are expected to act as a Subject Matter Expert guiding both customers and colleagues in Crowdstrike related projects such as onboarding of devices, configuration of the Crowstrike platform and sensor, as well as day-to-day work in terms of advanced analysis and threat hunting within the tool. A genuine interest in cyber security in general and Crowdstrike in particular combined with a strong technical background is crucial to fulfill the expectations within the role. Equally important is being actively engaged in developing new skillsets and knowledge development for the entire team by having a continuous learning mindset.


##### **Your Potential Background**

You have the passion and drive to keep our customers safe, so they can sleep soundly at night knowing we are protecting them.


We believe you have extensive experience in advanced security technologies and that you are skilled in areas such as EDR, NDR, SIEM and Cloud. You always think one step ahead regarding how the attacker might be trying to gain access, and what they may be after!


**Required Skills:**  

* Minimum 2 years working experience within security operations or similar
* Confident in verbal and written communication with internal and external stakeholders
* A good understanding of the Crowdstrike portfolio. E.g. sensor deployment, platform configuration, alert analysis and tuning
* Determined in pushing the product development and the way we utilize and work with the product
* Basic knowledge of operating systems internals
* Understanding of basic threat hunting methodologies
* Experience in incident report writing

Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.


##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**

If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Senior Cloud Security Specialist
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a** **Senior Cloud Security Specialist focusing on Microsoft Identity Cloud** **to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our** **Managed Security Services business area****.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 300 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. We are now looking for a Senior Cloud Security Specialist who wants to be at the forefront to stop cyber breaches.

##### **Managed Security Services**


Truesec helps customers globally with Attack Prediction Services, Vulnerability Management Services and Managed Detection & Response services for IT and OT environments. Our services are all delivered by skilled security analysis teams that conducts 24/7 attack monitoring, threat hunting, threat intelligence analysis, and threat remediation. Our team of experts works tirelessly to identify and prevent cyber breaches, and to help increase our customers’ proactive cybersecurity defenses. Our goal is to be an extension of our customers’ IT organizations, customizing a combination of capabilities and tooling, tailored to prevent cyber attacks in the most efficient way.

##### **The Role**


As a cloud focused senior threat analyst in the threat analyst and detection engineering team at Truesec you will work with a wide range of assignments, including analysis and investigation of the most advanced and complex attacks, detection engineering activities, and service enhancements in specific focus areas. You are expected to have one or more focus areas where you excel in expertise utilized for both internal and external engagements.


For this particular position we are looking for someone with extensive knowledge in cloud technologies, identity providers, container solutions as well as Linux OS. As a part of this team, you are expected to drive the cloud MDR solution forward, act as a subject matter expert towards customers in cloud discussions and be involved with security product suppliers and partners from a technical perspective.


A genuine interest in cyber security in general and cloud security in particular combined with a strong technical background is crucial to fulfill the expectations within the role. Equally important is being actively engaged in developing new skillsets and knowledge development for the entire team by having a continuous learning mindset.

##### **Your Potential Background**


You have the passion and drive to keep our customers safe, so they can sleep soundly at night knowing we are protecting them.


We believe you have extensive experience in advanced security technologies and that you always think one step ahead regarding how the attacker might be trying to gain access, and what they may be after!


**Required Skills:**  

* Minimum 5 years working experience within cyber security
* Structured and ambitious in leading or contributing to projects within your focus area
* Confident in verbal and written communication with internal and external stakeholders
* Extensive knowledge in cloud technologies (e.g. Azure, AWS or GCP)
* Intermediate knowledge of Linux Operating System

Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!
